name: Batty Zabella
description: A horror point-and-click game made with 30% nostalgia, and 70% sass.

name: Super Mario 64
description:
A port of Super Mario 64 included in Super Mario 3D All-Stars, built upon the Shindou Pak Taiou Version and its enhancements, also featuring updated textures and a higher output resolution.

With a timeless control scheme that’s featured in every one of his 3D outings since, Super Mario 64 marked Mario’s glorious debut into the world of 3D. Wall jump, backflip and even fly as you explore paintings around Princess Peach’s castle to collect Power Stars and stop Bowser!

name: Super Mario Galaxy
description:
A port of Super Mario Galaxy included in Super Mario 3D All-Stars, featuring Joy-Con and touch controls, updated textures and a higher output resolution.

Mario blasts off on an intergalactic quest to help Rosalina and save Princess Peach from Bowser’s assault of astronomical proportions. Defy gravity and hop across planets with optional motion controls, or pass a Joy-Con controller to a friend for some extra help in Co-Star Mode!

name: Moment to Midnight
description:
A promise. A prophecy. And a lost, little stranger.

Moment to Midnight is a small story game made in a week, inspired by Ludum Dare 45, with a lot of optional dialogue and a couple secrets.

name: Factory Town: Idle
description: Factory Town: Idle is an incremental-style Town Builder. Manage a bustling village so it will produce and sell a huge range of items - even when you are away. Then spend your exponentially growing pile of resources to unlock new tech and supercharge your production to unlimited speeds.

name: Attack of the Mutant Artificial Trees
description: A free online video game developed as part of a marketing campaign by the National Christmas Tree Association in 2004. The game was meant to support the natural Christmas tree industry and received criticism from artificial tree producers. It has been described as similar to Whac-A-Mole.

name: 0h N0
description: 0h N0 is a little logic game that complements 0h h1. It was created by Martin Kool. The concept is inspired by the Japanese Kuromasu.

name: Ranata the Frog and the Broken Forest
description: You have been summoned! help the Witch find the ingredients she needs in thiis arcade platformer.

name: Frogs
description: Try to get the frogs to the top of the screen to fed, by playing cards

name: Squid! Escape! Fight!
description: Swim under the sea with this hungry cephalopod and meet the other marine dwellers in this straight forward arcade adventure.

name: Frog Daddy's Dash
description:
Frog Daddy Dash is a game about the time crunch of being a single, working parent. Try to scrape together some money selling mushrooms during the day, and spend your limited time as a currency at night to take care of yourself and your family.

Sometimes you will have to make hard choices as to what you'll spend your hours on. When your a single, working parent, there's never enough hours in the day.

name: You&Me
description:
You&Me is a Yume Nikki fangame. This game focuses on the connection and mechanics of the dreams, both shared and not shared, between Yarn and Nyla, and how these two sisters influence one-another.

This game was created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam, in celebration of Yume Nikki's 13th anniversary. This is a game that follows a similar structure to Yume Nikki, as you explore through dreams and collect Stuff, but is otherwise a self-contained, original project.

name: Froggy's Battle
description: Froggy's Battle is an action roguelike game set in a loop. Help Froggy the steezy magician skater frog defeat all the baddies squatting her favorite riding spot. Choose your upgrades carefully, become more and more powerful and kickflip yourself through waves of enemies and ferocious bosses!

name: Trade Effluent
description: Trade Effluent is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. Your main goal is to find effects and progress to the next area. Each area has at least one effect in it.

name: The Dream Diary
description: The Dream Diary is an English fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It is also a fangame of Cinderella Girls, a title from the Idolmaster series. You play as Uzuki Shimamura, one of the characters from Cinderella Girls, as she explores her dreams.

name: Madotsuki's Story
description: Madotsuki's Story is a sidescrolling platformer-esque Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. The goal is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Frog Gift
description: A short game made for the NDJ7!

name: Hana Saku DS Gardening Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Mado Paf!
description:
Mado Paf! is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It is based on the video game Super Paf! by Amaka Soft, and was developed in Gemix Studio.

Mado Paf! is an arcade-style shooter game. The goal is to kill the enemies bouncing around the screen and get as high of a score as possible. The player has five lives, which are lost if an enemy touches the player character. The game ends when all lives are lost.

name: Vocaless
description: Vocaless is a unique platformer game with rhythm elements, you must perform all of your actions to the beat! Not only that, but everything in the game, from enemies to obstacles, follows the beat of the music.

name: InSomnus
description: InSomnus is an English Yume Nikki Fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars Fiona. You are stuck in a dream and cannot wake up. Explore various dream worlds from the central hub and find a way to wake up.

name: Lunchtime at Lilly's
description: Join Lilly for lunch!

name: Hentekorin
description: Hentekorin is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. Hentekorin is a 3D traditional fangame where your main goal is to explore.

name: Family
description: Family is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. This game has you control Mother who, like others in her family, is unable to leave the house. So to pass the time, Mother heads up to her and Father's bedroom and dreams.

name: Wizard Recurse
description: Save a wizard from a timeloop using their magic hat.

name: Dream Arena
description: Dream Arena is non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame in the arena fighter genre created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.

name: Do You Think This is a Game?
description: Do You Think This is a Game? is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It is a parody fangame regarding the leader of the Dream Diary Jam, Doc Saturn, jokingly threatening to ban Pyromantic from the Discord server unless they made a fangame in the next 4 hours under certain specifications (number of nexus doors, effects, and events).

name: Yn
description: Yn is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created in Sly engine for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars Madotsuki. Your objective is to explore the dream worlds.

name: MidCreati
description: MidCreati is a platformer game where a girl must escape by creating platforms, as she is captured by an evil organization who wishes to research her mysterious powers.

name: Long and Steady Departure
description: Long and Steady Departure is a platformer game about a mysterious girl named Aya who must traverse her own mysterious world by flipping the gravity.

name: Funkbot 02
description: Funkbot 02 is a rhythm game about a robot who must save Jet City's plants by navigating and watering plants to the beat of the music.

name: Frog 'N Roll
description: It's a frog rock concert! the frogs wear hats! what more could you want!

name: Ninja Froggies
description:
Ninja Froggies is a tower defense game in which you help the little Froggies to defend their pond against the Fishies that try to evade it and snacc their Tadpoles!

With a variety of brave warriors you can build up a strong army of Froggies to fight the waves of enemies approaching. Each Froggy has their own unique power or effect that either serve to fight head on or help others by increasing certain stats.

name: Frog Stack
description: Move frogs, stack frogs, build frog stacks and get to the flags.

name: Toadally Awesome Game
description: A hoppy little puzzle adventure for the Game Boy Advance!

name: Froggy Quest
description:
The original Froggy Quest made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2021.
Help Froggy on his quest to eat as many flies as possible! Use your sticky tongue to move crates and solve challenging platformer puzzles.

name: Kiyeko and the Lost Night
description: This well-thought-out title is an interactive story beautifully narrated by Academy-Award winning actor Ben Kingsley. Kingsley, in the role of the Story Teller, offers a pleasant, pleasurable stroll through an Amazon village and its surroundings. The story follows jungle-boy Kiyeko's effort to retrieve the Night, stolen by a couple of snakes reminiscent of Disney's bad-guy animal characters, through 11 different animated scenes - from Kiyeko's village in the Amazon jungle, through the forest, to the snakes' lair, and back again. The well-drawn graphics, which integrate 3D backgrounds with 3D animations, and movie-style quality of the title are lovely to look at, regardless of your age.

name: Box World
description: Box World is a single player puzzle video game for Windows 3.1, created and published by Jeng-Long Jiang in 1992.

name: NBA Live 08
description: Nintendo Wii port of NBA Live 08.

name: Starl Metaverse Project
description:
A grassroots space-themed metaverse and gaming project, the STARL Metaverse Project was built from the ground up by a team of community-sourced and AAA game developers and designers. It contains rich and sometimes outlandish designs, themes, environments, and characters that go beyond the mainstream and standard metaverse projects.

Starting out as a crypto token, it has evolved into a full-fledged game and environment built in Unreal Engine 5 and utilizing both on-chain and offchain assets so users can choose their level of involvement with blockchain technology. As the project's theme indicates, "Be Yourself" is the goal, and deep customization extends beyond characters to ships and environments.

There are portals within the STARL environment connecting to many aspects of the environment, such as the MMO Space flight, battle, and trading game Warp Nexus, live events arenas, living modules to conquer solar systems, meditation rooms, themed lounges, and the goal of integrating education into the environment.

name: NHL 2K10
description: NHL 2K10 is an ice hockey simulation developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports, part of the NHL 2K series. It was released on September 15, 2009 for Wii, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation 2. Randy Hahn and Drew Remenda provide commentary as they did for NHL 2K9. As of 2011, NHL 2K10 was the final 2K Sports ice hockey video game released for the PlayStation 3, PlayStation 2 and Xbox 360, as NHL 2K11 was released only for the iPhone & Wii.

name: Kaiju Princess
description: Living with a mysterious invader from outer space... who controls horrifying kaijus! (but she's pretty lazy).

name: Dungeons of Kairn
description:
Save the kingdom of Hamnlin from the Mad Mage Inshanis, by setting out to recover Artifacts hidden throughout the vast lands of Kairn. Recruit new adventurers from a variety of professions and level them up as you gain experience, slay monsters and explore the dungeons.

The Mad Mage is in possession of all the Artifacts save three. These you must recover, then journey to the Mad Mage’s island and use them to defeat him. The shareware version only includes the first dungeon; a registered copy adds the other 3.

name: Eerie Mountain
description: You are playing as a forest ranger that is going to investigate a sudden missing family on the Eerie Mountain.

name: Eight Corners: A Maguntsche Story
description:
An Insight Into The Past...

Taking place right before the events of Maguntsche: Chapter Two, you are a factory employee at the Pallen Organs Company who has awaken in a mysterious room with no memory of what happened before you were put here. The room has no windows or doors. Your goal is to find a way out. If there is one. But what is this? A hidden world is revealed with every blink. The air is cold and the space lacks light. Perhaps this darkness might shed some light on the unfortunate circumstances you have found yourself.

A Gift to Maguntsche Fans...

Releasing on the anniversary of Maguntsche: Chapter One, Eight Corners will give players the insight they need to be immersed in the growing universe when Chapter Two launches later this year.

How To Play...

Every 15 seconds, you will find yourself in one of two places. Our world or the realm. Our world acts as a "safe zone" where the player can charge their flashlight by accessing one of the terminals. If you enter the right sequence at the terminal, you gain +25% of your flashlights charge. When in the realm, there are two location you can be attacked from, using your flashlight you can flash an enemy using 25% of the charge to push them back away. There is a five second cool down for every time you use the flash ability. Your task is to survive as long as possible.

Increasing Difficulty...

The longer you survive, the more difficult the game becomes. The recharge sequences will gradually grow longer in length, and the enemies will approach more quickly.

name: Empty Head
description: In the small hamlet of Elkedor lives the Baker family, isolated and almost ''inexistent'' for the townsfolk. Arold, family man and lawyer with no fame, enters in a difficult time of his life between alcoholism and a falling apart marriage. His days began getting filled by drinking more and more, while his wife and their two children, Sarah and Thomas, started to get detached and cold. One night the two went missing. Desperate at the thought of losing them he decided to investigate until, thanks to clues found in the house, succeeds in finding a hidden passage. Lies, compulsions, and hatred are the summary of what underlies in the ambitious Baker family.

name: Experiment: Groceries
description: You go to the local supermarket every day, but you notice that something changes. You should figure out the truth about this place.

name: FallThru
description:
The beautiful vistas of farmlands, forests, mountains and deserts that greet you upon your arrival on Faland does little to calm your nerves about how you arrived at this strange land. Considering how dangerous it is with all the demons, monsters, wild animals and renegades running around you know you have only one thing you must do. Get back home.

The farm settlement of Or'gn is where your journey home begins. You and up to three players take turns trying to reach home while scoring as many points as possible. Since the journey is dangerous you may die but you will have multiple chances to continue your quest at a cost of demerit points. You must examine many items, talk to the inhabitants and solve side-quests. Arm yourself well and do battle with the enemies lying in wait. Earn ralls, the currency of choice around these parts, by finding treasure or trading commodities with shopkeepers. Raise your status high enough and you just may find your way back home.

Utilizing a rich back story FallThru is a interactive-text role playing game played in turns or alone. The player can communicate, trade and earn money in the ultimate goal of leveling their character up enough to finish the quest. The player may save their game at any point to continue later or to pass the game to another player. Dying will cost points but allows players to pick up where they last saved.

name: Fate Master
description:
On the planet Tafoi a war broke out: the Swocki ambushed the local Galluks, wiping most of the population. They are led by the Phenocles, an evil god. And, being a god, this is also a threat to the Alliance, which rules the galaxy. To get a picture of the situation, the Alliance decided to bring in an agent first before starting direct military intervention on Tafoi.

In Fate Master the player controls commander Tsin-Fei to gather information and preferably solving the situation on the planet without military strike. In the flip-screen landscape the commander can discover and collect items, enter doors, and approach enemies. On contact with enemies the game flips to a fighting screen, in which the player can attack or flee. On attack, one of the equipped weapons like pistols or grenades, can be used and in turns the player and the enemy attack until one of the fighters run out of hitpoints. Defeating an enemy is rewarded with gold, which can be used at a vendors to buy new or better weapons. The character has four stats: hitpoints, strength, skill and defence, which are automatically increased if the player reached a new level. On re-entering a room, previously killed enemies respawned.

NPCs give the player quests, like finding a person or special items, reaching certain places, in which often certain items are involved (like you need dynamite to open a blocked door). Games can be loaded and saved.

name: Federation
description:
Take on the might of the corrupt Empire on behalf of the ailing Federation in this epic future fantasy! Erra Quann, the treacherous alien scientist who designed Flagship Quann Tulla, the pride of the Federation, has hijacked the ship and piloted it to an outpost of the evil Empire where he plans to sell the secret of its engines. As a member of the elite Federation secret service, your mission is to stop him! The battle will take place in the energy-shattered hull of the Quann Tulla, through deep space and on to the final desperate conclusion on a distant alien world. The fate of the universe is once more (gulp!) in your hands!

Federation is a graphic text adventure and is an enhanced version of the 1985 text adventure Quann Tulla by 8th Day software. This version included graphics for each location as well as some minor location differences and some different directions.

name: Space Pirate Dernshous
description:
Dernshous was basically what I liked from Escape Velocity, which was seeing little spaceships flying around and shooting and docking at space stations, and the idea of going aboard other ships. So that's pretty much what Dernshous is, but I feel like it's still too much of a conventional game that it doesn't work how I'd like. I think I would've preferred it narrowed down more with a stronger focus rather than being half a normal space game.

Dernshous was almost meant to be a much simpler version of Slumos, my other space flying game, but it got out of hand as well. I included an old version of the game because I kind of like the looser under-done feel of it, I often feel like I lose something as I try and refine my games, so the older version could remind me of what I was going for / ideas I had earlier, as I was getting a bit lost with what to focus on.

name: Luigi and the Christmas Quest
description: A Christmas themed Super Mario Bros. mod

name: FeedVid
description:
Introducing FeedVid, a revolutionary new video-sharing website and social network. Our platform integrates an advanced neural-network based algorithm that automatically determines your viewing preferences. We serve you the content that you want to watch!

Update from FeedVid Inc. CEO August Williams

We are aware of an issue affecting a small number of users in which our algorithm will recommend disturbing or highly unusual videos. We appreciate the support from the community and ask that you flag any such videos that you find in your feed.

name: Ferret
description:
Ferret is a retro-style puzzle-solving game.

The game was born during the 80's in the world of mini-computers.

It will test your ability to solve problems, not your hand-eye coordination.

Unlike similar games, you have all the information you need, there are no secret instructions and definitely no cheats.

Can you rise to the challenge?

name: Funeral
description: A tale of existential horror — Attend a funeral and discover the dark secrets that have torn a family apart.

name: Get Home Safe
description: A tired man was on his way back to the river. However, he had to go home alone in a desolate atmosphere.

name: Ghost Study
description: You are participating in a study that aims to determine the effects of low-frequency sounds on the human body. Previous studies have shown that these frequencies can cause odd sensations that people attribute to Paranormal Encounters. What will you experience?

name: Good Boy
description: Its your birthday! Have you been a good boy?

name: Good Boy 2
description:
Happy birthday...again! Sadly before you have any cake mommy said you have to go see the doctor! What is she thinking? It's your birthday it should be time for cake, time to play with the cats! But don't worry, I'm sure nothing bad will happen..

Good Boy 2 is the sequel to Good Boy 1 and takes place a couple of years after the events of the first game. Featuring a new story and hand drawn graphics.

name: Agent Roy: Secure the Temple
description: Agent Roy: Secure the temple is a thrilling 3rd person action shooter. Roy is fighting a battle he cannot hope to win. 5 minutes. Deadly mercenaries. Can he hold the fort until the backup arrives? Prepare for the worst.

name: Brick Odyssey
description:
Brick Odyssey is a roguelike game built around block-breaker mechanics.
Upgrade your bricks to become stronger and fight unique enemies with special abilities.

name: Ninja Warrior Princess
description:
During a school trip to a ninja village attraction, you and your classmates participate in a gravity-defying training course that’s impossibly hard for everyone… except you. After clearing it with ease, you’re whisked away and told that you’ve been chosen to bring peace to two warring ninja clans—the attraction was merely a front.

You brush it off, but then you’re suddenly attacked by three ninja princesses claiming to be from a rival clan! When they show up again as new students at your school, will you be able to fend them off?!

name: Tricky Tracks
description: Tricky Tracks is a fun and exciting multiplayer hide & seek game with a twist: As a Runner, you leave footprints! Handle them cleverly and confuse your chasers while you're running and hiding. Or as a Seeker: Don't let them fool you!

name: Google Santa Tracker
description: Google Santa Tracker is an annual Christmas-themed web game first launched in 2004 by Google that simulates the tracking of the legendary character Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, using predetermined location information. It also allows users to play, watch, and learn through activities that are added daily in December.

name: Running MrBeast
description: MrBeast will you help the little piggy to survive through its journey and save your fortune from stealing?

name: Super Mario 3D World
description:
Rescue the Sprixie Princess and her followers by yourself or with three other players in this enhanced version of Super Mario 3D World, released as part of the Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury bundle.

As an enhanced version of Super Mario 3D World, some brand new gameplay improvements have been made to spice up this adventure. All characters have received a boost to their running speed and climb even higher after picking up a Super Bell, making platforming that little bit snappier. You can now also use gyro controls for certain sections of the game that previously required touch controls.

As well as same system and local wireless co-op play with up to four people, you can now play Super Mario 3D World together online for the very first time! Choose your character before each course and use all four characters’ different abilities to see everything that the Sprixie Kingdom has to offer.

developers.name: Nintendo EAD Tokyo Software Development Group No.1

name: Night Gal Summer
description: Evening Girl is a mahjong game from the arcade platform. It combines interesting elements with adventurous gameplay. It has given us a lot of fun after it was released. If you are also a loyal fan of this game, you must not miss it .

name: Grab
description:
Grab is a VR multiplayer parkour game. Climb, jump, slide and swing through the levels to reach the end, but don't fall or touch the lava!

A core component of Grab is the level editor that lets you and your friends create your own levels together and upload them for everyone else to play.

name: Word Worm
description: Help the Word Worm reach the finish line by making English words from the letters stacked in his way.

name: Carl Currency, Expert Exchanger
description: Sin descripción

name: Dr. Bon Bon Puzzle
description: It's not easy being a candy scientist! Dr. Bon Bon needs your help. Match three or more bonbons to clear them and four or more to morph into a bonus star. When the test tubes are full, click two to unleash Dr. Bon Bon's patented bonbon-melding technology!

name: Mega Mario World 2: Awakened Power
description: Sin descripción

name: A Maiden Astrologer Divines the Future
description: This work is an adventure game that you can enjoy about an astrologer named Izumi who feels happy and rewarded when "making someone happy" or "being able to support someone".

name: Undertone
description: A stylized first-person game that makes use of a lens gun to mix colors to effectively fight monsters.

name: Crossfire: Sierra Squad
description: Crossfire: Sierra Squad is a virtual reality first-person shooter video game developed and published by Smilegate.

name: Candy Crush Saga Ticket Model
description: Candy Crush Saga Ticket Model is a video redemption, touch screen arcade machine based on the super addictive and phenomenally popular mobile/facebook app.

name: Keepy Uppy
description: Help Bluey and Bingo play Keepy Uppy with the red balloon.

name: Dog Game!
description:
Dog Game is simple yet highly-addictive! To play, all you need to do is collect different kinds of cute & unique dogs and build a home for them, your very own Dog Tower! You can craft decoration and create lovely rooms to unlock cute new puppies to fill them with every single day.

Collect adorable dogs like shiba inu, husky, pug, bulldog, golden retriever and beagle! There’s over 900 puppys you can collect! Decorate rooms in your dog towers with your favourite styles: unicorn, fancy, legendary, anime, magic and so many more!

name: Black/Matrix II
description:
Rage was one of the four Great Generals of the Demon Army, but he was slain in a battle against the Angels. He has recently been revived, but has lost all memories of his previous life. With the war between Demons and Angels still continuing with no end in sight, he must restore his power and build his forces back up to strike back against the Angel Army.

Black/Matrix II is a turn-based tactical strategy game similar in structure to Final Fantasy Tactics, and the sequel to Black/Matrix. Characters level up and learn abilities individually, and it is possible to recruit a variety of characters, though only 6 at a time can be deployed into a battle. There are also several different romantic interests to pursue, with multiple endings for each depending on the player's choices throughout the game.

name: The Floor is Breathing
description: The Floor is Breathing is a short liminal space horror game. Play through multiple perspectives as you try to understand the deaths of four innocent people.

name: Fight the Dracula!
description:
Fight the Dracula is a 2D Action Game where you fight Dracula. The gameplay itself is inspired by "I wanna be the Boshy" and or Mega Man.

You enter the stairway to Draculas' throne room where encouraging horses will tell you words of encouragement and sometimes gameplay hints. The fight itself is a high focus combat where you have to swiftly react to Draculas moves and hit him in the head (like in Castlevania) until he falls and dies!

The fight requires high focus and concentration as the smallest slip up can and will cause a untimely demise to the player character.

name: Grainwind Incident 77
description: Grainwind Incident 77 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title.

name: Gravity Angels Part 2: The Betrayal
description:
Gravity Angels Part 2: The Betrayal is the second installment in Brilliant Digital Entertainment's Gravity Angels saga. Just like the first part, this Multipath Movie uses the in-game engine to render a real-time, three-dimensional, digitally animated story. At certain predetermined points in the storyline the player gets to choose one of multiple plot alternatives or paths that, while influencing the story, never change the actual outcome. Each Multipath Movie episode - they were originally available as Webisodes as well - runs approximately 30 minutes.

We rejoin the team of rogue employees, introduced in the first episode, on Jupiter's moon Ganymede just as the Miller Western Corporate Conglomerate is moving to turn the mining base into a death trap. It soon becomes clear that the company will stop at nothing to secure its interests in the alien artefact discovered deep below the surface. Green, the facility sheriff and company henchman, receives orders to terminate any witnesses. All transmissions are jammed, company backup is on the way and that means there's only two options left to our heroes: death or a desperate fight for survival.

name: Gravity Angels Part 3: Payback
description:
Gravity Angels Part 3: Payback is the third part in the epic Gravity Angels saga of Multipath Movies. These are not 'games' in the strict sense of the word, but digitally animated stories, rendered in real-time by the graphic engine, which can be influenced by the viewer at certain points in the story line.

After the events in the previous episode, the alien ship has started moving slowly towards the surface, gradually destroying the Ganymede colony in the process. The team has no choice but to go into the alien vessel and find a way to stop this.

To add to the predicament, Green, the base sheriff, who is now alone but still at large, is moving to make sure that if he doesn't make it out alive no- one else will either.

Our heroes split up into small teams to foil Green's sabotage plan and save the base. Many dangers await along the way and not everyone might live to see another day, but if they do, they'll make sure to get some... payback!

name: Gravity Angels Part 4: Death Force
description:
This is the fourth and final chapter in Brilliant Digital Entertainment's Gravity Angels series of Multipath Movies. Each one of these interactive movies uses a proprietary video engine that renders animated scenes in real-time. In the course of the movie, players can make a number of 'decisions' that will lead the story down different plot branches.

After the events of the first, second and third chapters, the enigmatic alien ship breaches the surface of Ganymede. Our heroes decide to pay another visit and stumble upon the ship's control room, where they will make a startling discovery.
Time is running out for the team as they find out that Miller Western, the most powerful company in human history, knew all along what was going on on Ganymede. Company reinforcements arrive in strength and they have no intention of taking prisoners. The only thing left to do for Ty, Felice, Jazz, Reece, Bennett and the others, is to start making preparations for their last stand against this Death Force...

name: Gregory's Epic Adventure
description: Visual-novel-epic-adventure-puzzle-parody-thing, baby! Give it a go for your pal Gregory!

name: Halls of Death
description:
Halls of Death is an adventure game where you play the role of one of many explorers who have entered the caverns and rooms over many floors, searching for the treasure within, the only difference hopefully is that you make it out alive. The screen is split into five different parts with two parts text, one a map of the floor you are on, your stats and finally what you can see in front off you or the creature you are fighting. Starting at the bottom of some steps, you move around the map searching each room and text tells you what you see and how many turns you have taken.

As you explore, some rooms will have traps, some will have treasure and others will have a creature or monster that wants to fight you seen from the side. You have a certain level of strength and psionics (magic) and you can either swing at the creature, retreat or use one of four spells which are sleep, teleportation, lighting and fireball. Spells sometimes don't work and can sometimes rebound and hit yourself. You both take it in turns to fight and it is game over if you lose all your strength. You can move your different levels of strength and psionics between each other as you avoid either reaching zero. Another level you have is constitution and this decreases as you explore further into the Halls of Death and so you need to return to the surface to rest.

name: Hamelin
description: Discover this reinterpretation of an old tail, "Pied piper of Hamelin".

name: Harvest
description:
Harvest is a suspenseful mystery adventure game. This first game by the independent developer Michael B. Clark delves into the subconscious and paranormal.

You are walking your dog in the park one night when he suddenly dashes off after something and disappears from sight. Searching for him, you find the entrance to an underground complex. Knowing your dog has gone into it, you follow and find yourself inside a huge bunker-like residence. Curiosity, plus the desire to find your pet, leads you further in. You uncover a madman's plan involving a water extraction machine and the poisoning of the population's water supply. The life of a once normal person was irrevocably changed with the death of his parents. What pushed him over the edge .. and where is your dog?

The story develops as you read diaries, newspaper articles and other materials left behind. Secret rooms in the bomb shelter type area are protected by elaborate locks with puzzles connected to them. Puzzles are varied and include inventory-based ones, mechanical-logical Myst-style puzzles, a slider puzzle, memory puzzles and a maze.

Graphics are mostly stills with little animation. There is mood-music and some sound effects can be heard. The game is mouse-controlled, point-and-click with various cursors for navigation and interacting with the environment.

name: Hell Awaits
description: You pour the Cereal into your bowl and a Game Cartridge falls with a clink into your bowl. You pick up the Jet black cartridge and inspect it. Across the Cover in blood red font it reads "Hell Awaits". Guess you're skipping breakfast today.

name: Hesperian Wars
description:
After the death of its emperor the Hesperian Empire breaks down and four races fight for the leadership. Each faction - Giants, Mages, Druids and Pygmies - can be played in their campaigns consisting of 20 missions. The missions goals are usually to destroy or protect something.

The units have special abilities and an inventory to store items like potions, money or spells which are left behind from defeated enemies. They also can be upgraded by moving them in the appropriate building (e.g. a blacksmith) and spending money. There is no classical base building.

name: Hotel Alien
description:
Hotel Alien is a science-fiction themed adventure game.

It happened one starry evening not too long ago. There was a flying saucer sighting that most people paid little attention to. Over a period of several weeks, many strange new guests were seen checking in at the Hotel Alien, run by a sweet little old lady who everyone called Grandma. As time went by, the regular guests checked out of the Hotel and told of strange goings-on inside. Grandma grew increasingly frightened at the mysterious changes that were taking place, and one night she simply disappeared.

The player must explore the 6 floors and basement of the Hotel Alien. Movement occurs by menu commands, or by moving in the mini-map in the top left of the screen. The player must explore the rooms of the hotel. About half of the rooms contain clues to a cryptogram left by Grandma, while the remainder include alien encounters and other interesting rooms. The player must learn the alien language to communicate with some of the hotel's denizens. There are also arcade mini-games. The player can save by visiting their hotel room in room 201. The goal is to find and rescue Grandma from the aliens.

name: Husk
description:
You've just inherited the estate of your distant relative, Dr. Hague Shoal, who disappeared nearly a century ago.

His home has been abandoned for decades, and the real-estate company refuses to send any more appraisers. They insist that you go and clear out the property yourself.

What's the big deal?
What happened to the appraisers?
And what's that scraping sound coming from the walls?

Husk is a short, atmospheric horror game taking you through the story of Dr. Shoal, as you uncover his past, and the horror that awaits in his decrepit home.

name: I Did a Bad Thing
description:
I Did a Bad Thing a narrative mystery puzzle game. IDABT slowly unravels a layerd mystery through puzzles, story, items and world building. The overarching story of IDABT is a fictionalized account of true events - a heinous murder/suicide in New England in 2007. This is the prologue demo. More episodes to be released upon continuing interest.

IDABT features original art, music and puzzles that may stretch beyond the boundaries of your device. The demo should provide about an hour or two of gameplay depending on your interest in ultra challenging puzzles. Think of it as Professor Layton, but in hell...and also you have no shoes.

name: Hituzibuster
description:
This is an invader mini-game.
Throw sheep to annihilate your enemies.
You have to collect the sheep you threw.
The game ends when you complete Round 30.

name: Merge Miners
description: Classic merge game with a twist. Easy to pick up and play!

name: Elsewhere in the Night
description: Elsewhere in the Night is a 2D psychic noir point and click adventure game. Play as private detective Lady Tick Tock as she investigates the latest in a string of unsolved murders.

name: The Dungeon of Doom
description: Shareware roguelike for the classic Mac. The later commercial version was known as "The Dungeon Revealed".

name: Madvent Calender 3 Necrosis
description:
It's becoming too powerful...
Lost in an ocean of dark isolation, her voice beckons to you once more.
The comforting black ink dissolves, and you bathe in the blinding glow of unnatural lights.
Your sight returns, and you are drifting in the bay of bustling city.
Many towers scrape the sky, but one pierces right through it.
The glass ball atop its point resonates with the same energy that religious symbol held.
In New Spook City a sickness shall spread.
Collect 24 dreams before they're all dead.

name: GunShy
description: A Classic Mac version of Shanghai Solitaire, Mahjong Solitaire & Shisen-sho.

name: The Land Before Time: Activity Center
description: The Land Before Time: Activity Center is the first educational title based on the The Land Before Time movie series. This game features a selection activities featuring trivia quizzes about dinosaurs, mazes, memory games, and building their own dinosaurs and printing them out to share with friends and family. Tree stars can be earned to unlock movies to be played in the Movie Theater.

name: Akashi
description: Akashi is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame. It follows Yugano, a girl who explores her dreams to collect Stoicheios (effects).

name: Bonetale
description:
Bonetale is a fan game based on Undertale on the Genocide path. In this game you, in the role of Sans, need to defeat an evil kid named Frisk.
The game features a well-developed combat system with multiple characters, you can fight as different Undertale characters in different levels and maps.

name: ColourS
description:
ColourS is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The primary goal of the game is to explore Midoritsuki's dream world and collect effects.

One interesting element of this game is that the majority of the dream world is initially in grayscale. There are several colored orbs hidden in the dream world for the player to find that will change the appearance of certain areas once obtained, also granting the player access to new areas/effects.

name: Dream Kombat
description: Dream Kombat is a Japanese 2D fighting game, featuring characters from Yume Nikki and its fangames. The concept (and some visuals) are based off the Mortal Kombat fighting game series.

name: D.O.W.N
description: D.O.W.N is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Hasutsuki (附荷子).

name: Empty
description: Empty is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Suo Xiangzi (锁箱子). Suo Xiangzi starts in her room, not able or unwilling to leave. Instead she can flick the light switch beside her bed to dream or access her computer to view wallpapers.

name: Eret Link
description: Eret Link is a short Yume Nikki fangame. This game stars a character from DreaMarbleng - a red haired girl named Borotsuki.

name: Kataribesou: Ensouki
description: Kataribesou: Ensouki is a game inspired by Yume Nikki, starring a featureless figure named Shidonoko, traveling into weird worlds from a building. The game contains RPG elements (combat, an item shop, etc.). It additionally lets one choose a difficulty level at the start of the game.

name: Kou
description: Kou is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It's a traditional fangame with two playable characters: Okutsuki and Nawatsuki. The overall goal of the game is to explore and collect effects.

name: Wonderland Adventures: Planet of the Z-Bots
description: Planet of the Z-Bots is the epic conclusion to the Wonderland Adventures trilogy, and the largest Wonderland Adventures game yet. Travel to distant planets, meet new characters, solve new puzzles, and save Wonderland from the menace of the Z-Bots.

name: Ls
description: ls is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame madeby an unknown creator. The game stars lca (with a lowercase L).

name: Made in Nightmare
description: Made in Nightmare is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Nemu's dream world and collect effects.

name: Maimu
description: Maimu is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Kiratsuki, a girl who refuses to leave the place she's staying at. The goal is to explore and obtain effects.

name: Mind Color
description: Mind Color is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Kitotsuki and explore a strange set of worlds outside your bedroom. The objective of this game is to explore and collect all of the Colors scattered throughout each world to unlock the ending.

name: Mortalis
description:
Mortalis is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Shimotsuki refuses to leave her room, instead exploring a dream world seeking to collect effects. Additionally, there is a game console resembling a GameCube in the room that can be used to play a minigame called Tomato.

Uniquely, music tracks are not given by merely entering areas. Instead, tracks are collected through finding floating orange music notes in dream world locations.

name: Nameless
description: Nameless is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as and explore the dreams of Mukuchi.

name: Negaigoto
description: Negaigoto is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Ken, a person living in an old-styled Japanese house with a small garden as opposed to a balcony. Unable to leave his house, he explores a dream world through sleeping in his bed. In the dream world, the nexus contains a single door with 4 possible locations, chosen randomly when the player sleeps.

name: On Border
description: On Border is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Jaretsuki's dream world and collect effects.

name: Onasu
description:
Onasu is a Yume Nikki fangame. It is based on the console game in Yume Nikki, Nasu.

Your goal is to catch the falling eggplants before they destroy all of the floor tiles beneath you and achieve the highest score possible.

name: Overdrive
description: Overdrive is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The player starts as a girl named 323, staying in a laboratory-ish room who doesn't want to go out of it. She can travel to a world called Outer World by entering the capsule machine in the room. Her purpose is to collect all Concepts in the Outer World. There is an unlockable character named 543, a boy that stays in a patient room and doesn't want to go out, after you find the way to meet him in Outer World.

name: Psyder
description: psyder is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Kataochi. You can also play minigame called Sushi Survivor.

name: Remegeton
description: Remegeton is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Harutsuki, a young girl who has locked herself in. Remegeton focuses on collecting effects and exploration, like most traditional Yume Nikki fangames.

name: Tamashii Yume
description: Tamashii Yume is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to beat the game as fast as you can. Along the way you face off with various characters from the original Yume Nikki, including doppelgängers of Madotsuki herself.

name: Trial
description: Trial is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You take the role of Suzutsuki, a girl who cannot leave her room, thus forcing her to explore her own dreams instead of reality. Trial has an unusually large number of effects compared to most fangames, containing 28 effects.

name: Unable
description: Unable is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Bility, a girl whose right eye is bandaged up. The objective of the game is to collect effects and explore the dream world.

name: Apple
description: Apple is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame made. It stars Píng Guǒ Zǐ, a girl who wears an apple costume. She cannot leave her room, so the only thing she can do is sleep in her bed and dream.

name: Yume Nikki Nijisousaku STG
description: Yume Nikki Nijisousaku STG is a vertical-scrolling shooter/bullet-hell style Yume Nikki fangame. You control Madotsuki from the original game as she fights her way through the White Desert.

name: Yume no Oto
description: Yume no Oto is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The gameplay of Yume no Oto is similar to a text-adventure game; only your commands are limited to choices.

name: Yume Memochou
description:
Yume Memochou is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, starring Shiranaishi. The objective of the game is to collect "Charas" (effects) and "Treasures".

Every time Shiranaishi dreams, the type of day cycles through. There are 4 types of "special days". The type of day can be chosen in the options menu using the object in the left side of the bedroom. Depending on what special day it is, important collectible objects may or may not appear.

name: Initial D: The Arcade
description: Initial D The Arcade is the latest title in the Initial D arcade game series, which has been running in arcades across Japan since 2002. In this title, not only have the graphics and operability evolved, but for the first time in the series, "In-store 4-unit battles" have been introduced, allowing players to enjoy a variety of battles, from 1 vs 1 to 1 vs 3 multiplayer battles. Furthermore, in the Story Mode, which was created using the original manga as its motif, a unique visual expression called 'manga shader' allows players to enjoy heated battles with the original characters as if they were playing in the world of the manga.

name: Astronomical Club for Queers
description:
You are a transgender civet named Louie. After the flood, at your friend's family home, you stayed at the family home of your friend, a gay fox named Oliver.

Listen carefully to the podcast with your buddies - pansexual alligator Miles and lesbian dog Kylie and learn more about the approaching Halley's comet. Admire the night sky with the help of a telescope together with asexual cat Darwin.

name: Atari Recharged Collection 1
description: Atari Recharged Collection 1 is on a region-free physical cart for the PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4.

name: Atari Recharged Collection 2
description: Atari Recharged Collection 2 is on a region-free physical cart for the PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4.

name: Invite Me In
description: Walking home alone one night, you meet an injured stranger in need of help. So you do what you'd hope anyone else would do for you in that situation... You invite him in...

name: Devilish Hairdresser
description: Good and evil continues in Devilish Hairdresser. The devilish saga of the devil girl and the angel, now creating hairstyles and haircuts in her hair salon.

name: Grave of Träumerei
description: Tsutsuji and Sumire meet at an unpopular subway station. For some reason, the train never seems to stop. Together, they search for clues to escape.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: The Game Boy Advance port of A Link to the Past has some small design differences with the original version, like Link's voice and an additional quest and dungeon unlocked after the completion of the main content. The new dungeon is only available after finishing Four Swords.

name: Wolf Girl With You: Full Moon Edition
description: Guess who's back? Back again. Liru is back! Tell a friend!! The DLC for that flirtalicious cohabitation simulation title "Wolf girl with you" is finally here! So what are you waiting for? Get ready to start a new life with Liru! Doggo!!

name: The Golf G
description: Dribble the ball to become the best golf player in the world.

name: Arcade Archives: Metal Hawk
description:
"Metal Hawk" is a shooting game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
Earn points by operating your aircraft while changing its altitude and destroying the targets displayed on the radar within the time limit.
Search for enemies at a high altitude, and if you find an enemy or enemy base, descend to range and destroy them.

name: Trivia Live
description:
Trivia-Live is a multi-player trivia game that lets you play head to head trivia against family and friends using your smartphone or tablet (iOS and Android).
Trivia-live is social gaming at it's very best in an easy, out of the box, pick-up-and-play trivia game that will keep everyone at the edge of their seat.
Jam packed with over 5,000 multiple choice questions in five categories, no game will be the same.

name: Emoji Kart Racer
description:
Get behind the wheel with up to four players and race across 16 intense racetracks. The unique emoji generator also gives you the opportunity to create your own personal emoji racer from thousands of combinations.

Let yourself be inspired by the colorful tracks with great music, funny sound effects and of course countless emoji's. Great emoji power-ups
like poop or rocket are also available!

name: Sawnic
description: Sawnic is a special Sonic with all sorts of new abilities, gameplay changes, quality of life tweaks, and even more!

name: Merry Christmas, Alfred Robbins
description: Merry Christmas, Alfred Robbins is a point-and-click adventure game made in roughly two weeks about an ordinary man who works hard to support his wife and son. Although it seems like it will be a very bleak Christmas in their household, Alfred does his best to make the situation better.

name: Mega Man World 5 DX
description:
Mega Man V was released on 1994 for the original Game Boy. While the previous four entries in Nintendo’s handheld recycled some content from the NES games, the fifth and final entry finally got its unique story, original enemies and a bunch of exclusive features. And now… you can truly enjoy it in full color!

Just imagine, in the era of Game Boy Color, when Zelda, Tetris and many other games were re-released as the famous DX versions… How Mega Man could have looked if Capcom had made a DX version of this underrated gem? Now you can with this ambitious colorization project that took more than two years! And, not only that, but the hack also optimizes the game’s code, thus removing all slowdown from the original game! Pause menu has been reprogrammed as well, and added icons to every weapon (just like the later NES Mega Man games), making it looking gorgeous!

name: Nightmare Castle
description:
Nightmare Castle is an extended technical demonstration and a surreal adventure game, built as a platform to test reduction and refinement of RPG Maker's VFX to PC-88 or early PC-98 standards. As such, the game uses 3-bit graphics at a resolution of 640x400.

A re-imagining of Amiha's Nightmare Castle, the game uses an 8-color palette and minimalist audio with Yume Nikki-style gameplay.

name: Cosmic Dream
description: Cosmic Dream is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3. The game features two playable characters: Astynomia and Timoria. The player's goal is to explore and collect Data (effects).

name: Luar
description: Luar is a Yume Nikki and an AN EARTH2 fangame. At the start of the game, the player is given the choice of two characters to play as: Corey or Doberman. The goal of the game is to explore and collect Valuables (Precioso) that change the protagonist's appearance and/or give them new abilities as well as items known as Dream Pieces.

name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: In First Snow With Her
description:
Summer vacation is over, and September approaches autumn.
Literary club on the verge of abolishment. I, who is the manager of the club, and my junior member Tomoya Serizawa.

name: tModLoader 64Bit
description:
Welcome to the unofficial tModLoader 64-bit branch of tModLoader!
This is a fork of Original tModLoader, and it's only been made a possibility due to tModLoader being open source!

name: Rally-X Arrangement
description: A remake of Rally-X released first in the Namco Classic Collection Vol. 2.

name: Xevious Arrangement
description: A remake of Xevious, released in Namco Classic Collection Vol. 1.

name: Do What They Say
description:
This is a Public Service Announcement, the world is experiencing a Class G Global Event.

All agents are required by Global Catastrophe Protocol 56-EE to complete their alloted redaction paperwork before extermination can be allowed to take place.

Management would like to remind you that any extermination that takes place before Global Catastrophe Protocol 56-EE may incur penalties, such as but not limited to, loss of fleet vehicle access, reduction of holiday hours, sudden psychic expungement and eviction from allocated staff accomodation.

DO WHAT WE SAY

name: Mappy Arrangement
description: A remake of Mappy, released in Namco Classic Collection Vol. 1.

name: Don't Enter the Forest
description:
Don’t enter the Forest is a short sci-fi exploration game about getting lost in a forest.
Your car breaks down in the forest and you get lost. Very quickly you discover that there is more going on than in an ordinary forest.
You decide in which direction you walk. But your decisions could lead you to various places and endings!

Discover a sci-fi short story!
Get lost in the forest!
Discover 3 different endings!
18 achievements!
Playtime 30min - 2h!

name: Dungeons of Moscow
description:
Dungeons of Moscow is a throwback classic first person shooter game.

Your main quest is to kill the necromancer Ivan the Terrible who revives evil spirits.
Beware of traps and harmful items what can kill you more quickly than enemies. Explore the different locations of dungeons and find all weapons to use them in final boss fight. This is your way to become a hero who defeated evil and save the civilians.

name: Eight
description: The world has been infected by deadly purple flowers. Eight lives are forever changed and they must come together to rid the world of this floral enemy.

name: Forgotten School
description:
Forgotten School / 忘れられた学校 is a short atmospheric Japanese VHS aesthetic horror game with a deeper meaning.

Japanese school girl Akiyo shows up at her school in the morning, but it would seem that everyone is gone. Through her video camera she always keeps on her, she discovers a hidden dimension unseen to the naked eye.

name: Motos Arrangement
description: A remake of Motos, released initially in the Japanese version of Namco Museum Battle Collection.

name: Pac-Man Arrangement Plus
description: Originally released in Namco Museum Vol. 2 for the PSP.

name: Don't Give Up the Cat
description:
Tonight, you are out in the woods. As a cat.

A short game intended to be played at night, using headphones. In this first-person game you use your mouse to look around and scratch things, and WASD keys for walking, shift to run, and you use Esc to show the menu.

After you run you may sit around to breathe a bit and listen to the forest. Don't forget to explore around. But you may not be alone...

name: Namco Museum Vol. 1
description: The original Japanese versions of Namco Museum Battle Collection were released in two volumes.

name: Pac-Man Vs.
description: A port of Pac-Man Vs., released initially inside Namco Museum DS.

name: Highland Spirit
description:
Becky Speed is an aspiring novelist who is seeking to break her writer's block with a relaxing solo trip to the Scottish Highlands.

However, Becky is about to discover that in her idyllic cottage, she is not alone at all...

name: Xevious Ressurection
description: A new game in the Xevious series, only released as part of the Namco Museum Essentials compilation.

name: Galaga Remix
description: A modified version of Galaga, released first in the Namco Museum Remix compilation. Pac-Man rolls through a track while the Wii Remote is used to shoot Galaga enemy ships.

name: Rally-X Remix
description: A remixed version of Rally-X, released first in the Namco Museum Remix compilation.

name: Gator Panic Remix
description: A remixed version of Gator Panic, originally a redemption game, later ported for Wii in the Namco Museum Remix compilation.

name: Gator Panic
description: A digital port of Gator Panic (which is a redemption game), released only for iOS, that was delisted in 2015.

name: Grobda Remix
description: A remixed version of Grobda, first released in the Namco Museum Megamix compilation.

name: Gaplus
description: A port of Gaplus developed by M2 for the NES capabilities, released in Namco Museum Archives (Namcot Collection).

name: Dig Dug Remix
description: A bundle including Dig Dug Arrangement (2005) and the original Arcade game.

name: RonRon
description: This is Ron Ron, the official mahjong site of the Japan Professional Mahjong Federation.

name: Letter Labyrinth
description: A word puzzle game featuring Pac-Man.

name: Assault Plus
description: This game is an upgrade of "Assault". Your mission is to reclaim your homeland by destroying the enemy forces that have taken over. You have an Assault tank, the supreme mobile weapon. Your tank has artillery guns and grenades, can perform Rapid Rolls to dodge enemy shots, and uses Power Wheelies to launch grenades.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Draw
description: Friday Night Funkin' Draw is a draw game combined with rhythm FNF music battle. At the end of each level, Friday Night Funkin' Draw will provide you with FNF catchy music from various FNF characters: Garcello, Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster Spirit, Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty.

name: I Have A Fear
description:
Be my first tester of the project, I've been working on recently..

If you have some time on your hand, take a look at my works as you wonder through some of my games I made in the past.
This is my first time making something public, the levels you are about to see really needs some feedback. If you are ready, we can start right away..

name: I Rented a Boat
description: A first person walking simulator where you need to get out of an island, but you are not alone, and this is a good thing!

name: Stargazer: Dreams of the Star
description: Miku has just transferred schools due to her parents work. She wanders into the infirmary, where she meets a mysterious girl named Hoshimi. Will that encounter change the fate of the two girls?

name: Into the Crops
description:
Into the Crops is a horror game inspired by the early 2000s horror games for the PS1 such as Silent Hill and the PS1 Haunted Demodisks. Created by 5 students of the University of Alicante as part of their Project Based Learning with only C++ and OpenGL.

Grab your trustworthy oil lantern and explore an eldritch cornfield that is trying to corrupt you, protecting yourself with the light.

name: The Snowman Story
description: The snow has finally come, and you have the chance to build the snowmen, which you ever wanted. Go on and enjoy the snow!

name: Extreme Wrestling
description: Select 2 amongst 13 wrestlers to make up the best Wrestling team and find your path until you win the world championship belt. In addition to punches and kicks, you’ll be able to use 21 combos to make up the best Wrestling moves seen so far. Served by superb animations and a fantastic ambiance, highly playable with intuitive controls, Extreme Wrestling will allow you to play on 4 difficulty settings.

name: Zippy the Circle: Special
description: A game in the "Zippy the Circle" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Santa Claus: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Pretty Bird 9
description: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. He is the last bird from the nest that can't fly yet. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: The Jumping Onigiri
description: Join Big O on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Jumping Onigiri: Turbo
description: Join Big O on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Valkyrie Profile: Lenneth
description: An intricate and evocative tale of fates woven by gods and mortals, steeped in Norse mythology, punctuated by groundbreaking combat, and brought to life by a soundtrack considered among gaming's greatest. New features such as rewind function, quick save and load, visual presets, etc have been added.

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Veins
description:
Outside of your room you meet a strange boy, who claims he is your friend, and you must find your true past by walking through all the worlds behind all of the drips.
By walking through maps, you can truly become friends with your companion, and deduce what was your past, and why you forgot everything.
You must gain all effects and make some good decisions to get the best ending.

name: Witch Effect
description: Witch Effects is a horizontal side-scrolling shooter. Your main objective is to defeat all the enemies as well as the boss at the end of the stage. You play as Madotsuki, with her Witch effect equipped.

name: Dreamgame
description: Dreamgame is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore the game's world and reach the ending. The player can interact with the environment by moving around onto objects.

name: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up
description: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Madotsuki as she tries to avoid her canonical end by gathering NPCs in the dream world.

name: Mafurako: Jiyou Jikan
description: Mafurako: Jiyou Jikan is a space shooter with Yume Nikki elements. You play as Mafurako who is being attacked by Jellyfish, Toriningen, and other antagonistic NPCs from Yume Nikki. The goal is to avoid enemies and their projectiles.

name: Pastel x Pastels
description: A short and colorful experience designed for whose familiar with games like LSD Dream Emulator, Yume Nikki and etc., as well just people enjoying surreal and dreamy themes.

name: Hansel and Gretel DS
description:
Your destiny will change depending on the path you choose.
Is it a beast that attacks the two? A witch? Or...
Please guide them to the ultimate "hunt" ending.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Omega Edition
description:
Write your own epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in Assassin's Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny and define your own path in a world on the brink of tearing itself apart. Influence how history unfolds as you experience a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.

The edition was exclusively available at Gamestop and contains full game + digital bonus + artbook + map

name: Repugnant Bounty
description: Rosemarie, an alien princess from the planet Nimola seeks genocide on the evil monsters who killed her mother and people.

name: Calliope Mori's Underworld Tour 2022
description: Calliope Mori takes her first break in millennia and goes golfing with her good friend Kureiji Ollie!

name: Firearms
description: Firearms is a first-person shooter mod for Half-Life which originated from a Quake modification. Initially developed in 1998, Firearms was created as a quasi-realistic team-based FPS. The mod's main feature is the large amount of usable weapons in the game.

name: Zandronum
description: Zandronum is a multiplayer oriented port, based off Skulltag, for Doom and Doom II by id Software. Zandronum brings classic Doom into the 21st century, maintaining the essence of what has made Doom great for so many years and, at the same time, adding new features to modernize it, creating a fresh, fun new experience.

name: Animal Crossing: Classic Game Card - Ice Climber
description: An e-Reader card which adds Ice Climber to Animal Crossing.

name: Animal Crossing: Classic Game Card - Mario Bros.
description: An e-Reader card which adds Mario Bros. to Animal Crossing.

name: Animal Crossing: Card Game - Boy (1)
description: An e-Reader card which allows the player to play the minigame Animal Relay A.

name: Animal Crossing: Card Game - Girl (1)
description: An e-Reader card which allows the player to play the minigame Animal Jumprope (Jump Rope A).

name: Animal Crossing: Card Game - Boy (2)
description: An e-Reader card which allows the player to play the minigame Animal Relay B.

name: Animal Crossing: Card Game - Girl (2)
description: An e-Reader card which allows the player to play the minigame Animal Jumprope (Jump Rope B).

name: Zero Visibility
description: A chilling cosmic horror game about four friends that get lost in a blizzard.

name: Selkö
description:
You have come to dive here for the silence... but also because something amazing lies in the depths - or so says the rumor.

As you calmly descend into the abyss, use your flashlight to discover the aquatic life surrounding you and solve the puzzles protecting the secrets of the sea.

name: Lilith's Hunger
description: Three witches go to the house of the newcomer in town. She serves them tea with a gentle smile bit as one of them takes a sip Bera hears a loud noise and sees one of her friends fall onto the ground.

name: Mario Kart Midnight
description: Mario Kart Midnight is a custom track distribution created by marionose1 and ZPL. It aims to be a celebration of custom tracks, featuring the "best" tracks released between December 2021 and November 2022. Every track released during this time period was featured in monthly public polls, which were voted on by custom track enthusiasts. Every track that averaged a score of four or above out of five was guaranteed a spot in the distribution. In order to reach the total of 200 tracks, certain trcks that averaged 3.5 out of five were also included.

name: Tamagotchi Ocean
description: The Tamagotchi Ocean is an ocean life-themed Tamagotchi released in Japan in March 1998 and later on in the USA in August. The Tamagotchi featured a motion sensor, similar to the Tamagotchi Angel, which was used to scare underwater predators away.

name: Mini Scientist
description: The mini scientist needs an engine for his rocket to get to the space. Use your mouse to point and click causing a chain of actions and reactions that will unlock each mini level.

name: Love in Login
description: Met the girl who is my game buddy in real life.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX
description: The international version of Mario Kart Arcade GP DX has some gameplay differences from the Japanese original, with the main difference being the lack of the National Battle mode.

name: Into the Dark
description: Into The Dark, is a third-person perspective Psychological horror/survival game inspired by games like Silent Hill and Resident Evil. It puts you in the shoes of a thief, who in hope of finding something EXTRAORDINARY enters the Quinson Villa, a place locked down, for decades, no one knows why no one knows what crawls inside, but the only thing they do know, is it hides something!

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Rosalina
description: Unlocks Rosalina in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Metal Mario
description: Unlocks Metal Mario in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Baby Mario
description: Unlocks Baby Mario in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Baby Peach
description: Unlocks Baby Peach in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Daisy
description: Unlocks Daisy in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: King Teresa
description: Unlocks King Boo (King Teresa in Japanese) in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX. It was first available as a limited-time event, later released for everyone.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Jugem
description: Unlocks Lakitu (Jugem/Jugemu in Japanese) in Mario Kart Arcade GP DX.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Pac-Man Cup Update
description: Update 1.10 in Japan, which added Pac-Man Cup and its two courses. It also added support for the Daisy and King Boo DLC.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX: Donkey Kong Cup Update
description: An update which adds Donkey Kong Cup and its two courses. It also adds support for the Lakitu DLC.

name: Invaseave
description:
The oceans have been invaded by a strange type of fish. These fish are rapidly reproducing, destroying all native forms in the area. We have deployed Tethys, a robotic drone to capture and study these fish.

Where did they come from? Why are they decimating our oceans?

How do we stop them? How do we prevent this from happening again?

name: Sonic Mars
description: Sonic Mars is a cancelled Sonic the Hedgehog originally designed for the Sega 32X. Likely due to the system's limitations and commercial failure, the project was moved to the Sega Saturn where it evolved into Sonic X-treme.

name: Journey Home
description:
A sharp clap of thunder jolts you awake.
You find yourself cold and alone in a dark forest clearing.
You have no memory of who you are or what you're doing here.
You just know that you need to make it to the distant light that you recognize as home.

But the forest is not going to make it easy...

And you might just find that there's more to this strange pilgrimage than meets the eye...

Journey Home is an old-school point and click adventure game with a modern twist. The game features multiple endings, death sequences, secrets, optional puzzle strands and much more. It will take most players around 1 hour to complete.

name: Soul of Yokai
description:
You are a young businesswoman who has recently gone through a break-up. You travel to Kyoto in hopes of mending your broken heart and maybe finding a new love. You didn't, however, expect it to come in the form of a Yokai (Japanese demon). After a chance encounter, you are invited to the Yokai world, where you meet three attractive young men of varying Yokai races: Hayato a half Oni, Yukio of the Yukiotoko race, and Karasu of the Tengu. You are surprised to find out that they all want your hand in marriage! Not everything is peaches and cream, however, as you notice a darkness looming over the Yokai townspeople, and a growing dislike of human beings.

Can you help mend the relationship between the yokai and humans all while helping these boys overcome their own personal traumas? Can you find love among demons? Find out in Soul of Yokai!

name: Tag with Ryan
description:
Do you have what it takes to outrun Combo Panda? Tag with Ryan is the coolest endless runner game for ALL AGES!

Combo Panda, the ultimate gamer, has challenged his friend Ryan to an endless game of tag! Combo Panda has hidden Ryan's different costumes all over the game, and Gus the VTuber is helping guard them. It's up to you and Ryan to unlock them all!

name: Starship Iwamachi
description:
You are on a starship under attack by a vicious enemy and are the only one left behind to save your lover.
The maze-like interior of the ship is automatically generated, so it changes every time you play.
Walls and other surfaces can be destroyed with guns. The ship's interior will erode into a mass of blood and flesh as time goes by!

name: ColorWorld
description: Sin descripción

name: Bewilder House
description:
Bewilder House is a first-person puzzle game where you have to overcome a feeling of loss of bearings.

Trapped in strange mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll have to use your mind and first person controls in unusual ways to escape a deceptive funhouse that plays with both your perception, and your life.

name: Dead Dimension
description:
Dead Dimension is a short graphic adventure, designed to be played in one session.

In the year 2169, humanity has conquered the galaxies. Manned space travel has gone beyond what is humanly conceivable. Unfortunately, it has been proven with horror that there is no extraterrestrial life. The space race no longer makes sense.

However, the sights have turned to a new unexplored universe: the hidden dimensions.

Peter Travers, a prisoner enrolled in NASA's Interdimensional Exploration program with the intention of receiving prison benefits, must carry out a simple mission: go through the first dimensional portal and repair it from the other side.

name: Jubeat Ave.
description: The awaited tenth version of the arcade rhythm game jubeat, called Ave.

name: Far Cry 3: Monkey Business
description: The DLC adds 4 additional missions in the story mode, which involves Hurk to be recognized as a Rakyat warrior.

name: 3 Billion Dreams for a Forgiveness Machine
description: A featureless doll is locked in an apartment, and must write stories that will always be rejected, and must eat feces out of instant-noodle containers despite having no mouth, all for the Forgiveness Machine.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu Wii: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 7: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2000: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 8: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 12: Kettei-ban
description: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu or Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyu (lit. "Live Powerful Pro Baseball"), also known simply as Power Pro or Pawapuro to non-Japanese speakers, is a traditionally Japan-only baseball series created by Konami.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 13: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 14: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: eXceed 2nd: Vampire
description: Sin descripción

name: Orb
description:
The object of ORB is simple. You must guide the orb through the level to the goal.
You do this by simply clicking on the orb and drag it to the green goal zone. But the orb must not hit a wall or you’ll have to start again.

name: Anomiac.
description:
“Anomiac.” is an exploration game about a little girl whose ability to communicate has been impaired due to having a stoke. Through dreaming, she experiences a vibrant, colorful, crazy world where she feels uninhibited and is able to experience the things she can’t while awake.

“Anomiac.” was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 2 by Kip Icon Games using RPG Maker MV.

name: Curtained Moon
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame inspired by noir aesthetics. Made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

Travel through dreams of Veda, uncover secrets of her past and find the moon. By touching any object, you can travel to another dream.

name: Daze
description:
A Yume Nikki fan game made for the Dream Diary Jam 2018.
A game by the name, Daze or Da-Ze which follows the 'story' of someone called Nio. Go to sleep and get effects.

name: Asphodelus
description: Asphodelus is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created by Chalk Flower for Dream Diary Jam 2. The protagonist is a girl named Tsuneko. Your goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu Next
description: Sin descripción

name: NvmU
description: NvmU is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the Dream Diary Jam 2. A NASU clone for the Sega Dreamcast Visual Memory Unit. Your goal is to collect as many falling eggplants as you can to achieve a high score.

platforms.name: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Overgrowth
description:
Overgrowth is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 2.

You play as a boy named Pumpkin, who awakens in a hospital with no memory as to how he got there. He explores his dreams to try and find his lost memories.

name: Q73
description: Q73 is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. A traditional fangame, where the goal is to explore and collect effects as well as items.

name: A Quiet Air
description: A Quiet Air is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 2. The game follows a nameless young woman who inherits a large and strange house from her great-aunt. Here, she finds her dreams taking her to mysterious places.

name: Stitch
description:
A furry Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

Stitch is a cat girl who has always vividly dreamed. Her dreams are becoming lucid. They begin to recur, returning to the same places.

name: Movie to Movie
description: A trivia game for movie lovers. Form a chain between two movies, 6-degrees style! Play the daily challenge or make your own.

name: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind
description: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. The game uses Alice in Wonderland as its theme mixed with 1960's aesthetic. You play as Elizabeth, a young 1960's college student who is having weird dreams. The goal is to explore and collect effects. The player can collect items hidden in the dream world as well.

name: Yqriel
description:
yqriel is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

yqriel is a traditional fangame, focusing on exploration and item collection. Instead of a Nexus, the player starts in one specific area and can explore the world from there.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu '97: Kaimaku-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Yume Nikki: Date Poniko!
description: You play as Madotsuki who gets invited to visit Poniko's house for a date. The main goal of the game is to get Poniko to like you by selecting the right dialogue choices.

name: Press Play
