description: A person finds himself stuck in a loop of his regular life cycle. In order to break it, he'll have to take a few wrong turns and explore the world around him a bit deeper than usual. A Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu S
description: Sin descripción

name: Pawapuro GB
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu '98: Kaimaku-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu '98: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallen Kingdom
description: The Fallen Kingdom is under attack and YOU must save it! Explore a massive universe and defeat a mysterious evil -- collect unique spells, tame adorable pets, face 15 massive bosses, and complete magical puzzles as you become the next ruler of the world.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu '99: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2000: Kaimaku-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu: Dreamcast Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Die Känguru-Verschwörung
description: Achtung, Achtung! This retro platforming movie tie-in for "Die Känguru-Verschwörung" is only playable in German! Zis is not a drill!

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2001: Kettei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2002 Haru
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu Portable 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu Portable 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Divine
description:
di^ine is a Yume Nikki fangame made in RPGMaker 2003 for the 2019 Dream Diary Jam.

Fall asleep to see through Astrum's eyes and wander through her vision.

name: Ep3
description: Ep3 is a Yume Nikki fangame which retains roughly the same gameplay formula but with a own twist on it. Ep3 was originally made for the Dream Diary Jam 3.

name: Calling of my Nightingales
description: A Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 3. Tristan is stuck in his room for unknown reasons. In his dream world he can meet individuals known as Nightingales.

name: Caution
description:
A small project for the Dream Diary Jam #3. You play as Chui, who's trying to complete an essay while sleep deprived. The main goal is to explore and collect effects and items. There is also a collectible currency called Muns, which can be used to purchase items in the dream world.

There are two bars displayed on the top-left corner of the screen: ZZZ's; which act as a life bar for the player character that depletes when the player runs into a hazard in the dream world, and PRG which represents how much of the essays been written and increases each time the player works at the table.

name: June 30th
description:
Welcome to Hotel Paradise! The view may be average, but the beds are so comfy, you'll never want to leave. What's more, there's a rumor: some say if you collect a lot of souvenirs, your wish will be granted. Are you up to the challenge?

Created for the 3rd Dream Diary Jam.

name: Milk
description: This game was made for Dream Diary Jam 3 and updated for Dream Diary Jam 5. It follows Bob and his adventures in his weird dreamscapes caused by drinking spoiled milk.

name: Sunlit
description:
Sunlit is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3.

Play as a young woman named Clover, explore her dream world, and find effects.

name: Ray - Part 1
description: Ray Part 1 is the first game in the Ray series of games. Get involved in the criminal underworld in this violent point-and click interactive movie with great visuals that are inspired by South Park.

name: Is This Undertale
description: A short Yume Nikki/Undertale fan-game made for Dream Diary Jam.

name: Ray - Part 2
description: The violence continues in this point-and-click interactive movie that takes its inspiration from South Park.

name: Sweet Dream
description: Sweet Dream is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3. You play as Shurui Shian, a boy who is trying to find happiness through his dreams.

name: This Emptiness
description: A Yume Nikki fan game set during the 1960s. Play as a Soviet spy deep inside the United States government who has bad dreams.

name: Dream RPG
description: Dream RPG is a unique Yume Nikki fangame, containing dialogue and RPG-style battles. The game is divided into routes accessed through the Nexus that branch out into paths to Nightmares, the boss battles for the game.

name: Yume Nikki Rythm
description: A Yume Nikki themed rhythm game.

name: Yume Nikki Jam 2018 Submission
description: Yume Nikki Jam 2018 Submission, also shortened to YNJ-2018, is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. You explore the dreams of a certain rabbit.

name: The Chicken Game
description:
This is not your parents' chicken farming simulator. Granted, they probably didn't have a chicken farming simulator, but still!

Starting your journey as a humble farmer, you will improve and expand, unlocking and rediscovering the long lost secrets to the chicken genome. What secrets might you ask? Polka dots. And rainbow stripes. And super speed. Design your own farm, collect your crops, and create new and unique chickens in this indie pixel-art game.

name: MuseSwipr
description: A rhythm game where you swipe between two lanes to the beat. Form your own flow and unleash your greatest swiping performance.

name: Joyous Rebel
description:
Joyous Rebel is an RPG inspired by the Ultima series of games. Initially a shareware title, it was later made available free of charge. It is a reworked version of a smaller game known as Joyous Rebellions of Jive Culture.

As a guardian it is your duty to defend the king of light. But you had to travel from you islands on a journey of peace and while you where gone booth the king and you feels that evil draws near. You hurry back to you island to defend the king but an enormous storm slows you down and a lightning almost kills you when it hits your boat a fisherman saves you and let you sleep over the night in his cabin. You are now well rested and must hurry to the caste to save the king of light.

The screen is divided into two parts; to the left is the game area where all the action takes place and to the left is your inventory and indicators of what action you are about to execute. In the game you can use four commands: change between attack mode and walk mode, fire ballistic weapon, Do it (climb stairs, open doors, pick up items) and use inventory. The inventory can contain 24 items.

name: Kayden Garth
description:
An emergency call is received from a surveillance station overseeing the prison planet of Kayden Garth, indicating that the station may have inexplicably been dragged into the penal colony and its crew disappeared. A task force of four undercover agents is sent to Kayden Garth to investigate the source of the signal.

Kayden Garth is a role-playing game that is controlled in the style of Ultima, alternating an overhead world map to first-person dungeon crawling. The player assembles a party of four by picking each character out of eight possible alien races and eight classes, with some classes being available to certain races only. Some mutant races are able to cast psionic spells, including light, healing, teleport, attack spells and seeing the dungeon map. Combat is extremely simplified, taking place against one opponent at a time and only allowing a choice between attacking, casting spells or fleeing. There is no micromanagement of party members or their inventory.

The game includes a form of economy, with credits that can be looted from defeated monsters, bet in casinos and used to buy weaponry, shields, torches and rations. Light sources, along with light spells, are essential to the exploration of dungeons.

name: Knorrig the Gifted Troublemaker
description: Who said having a pet piggie is a bad idea? Well, you did. Just now. It's 10 minutes before the festive dinner and you find yourself in a pickle thanks to your pet. Or should we say 'pigle'. The lovely gift for your sister is gone. Will you manage to get it back in time?

name: Last Stop: Station 66
description:
You fell asleep during a train ride after visiting your friend. Upon awakening you realize you've arrived at the last stop, except this line shouldn't have more than 25 stops, but you've now arrived at Station 66. Uncover the mystery behind what is actually going on, and go in depth with the multiple outcomes to your story and ultimately your demise.

Features 2 different endings depending on player actions through non-linear gameplay routes and exploration taking the player to different locations and providing different outcomes. To fully understand the story you must complete both.

Last Stop: Station 66 is a 90s VHS Found Footage Psychological Thriller Horror experience that plays on realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a deep atmosphere.

name: Legends of Tzonac: The Great Dungeon Escape
description: Kalzrak and Clash fall into a long-lost dungeon. Kalzrak is severely injured in the fall, and all that is left of him that works is his head. Now he and Clash must work together to find or build him a new body, and escape! But a dark presence sleeps within this dungeon, and their fall has caused it to stir...

name: Legends of Tzonac 2: Friendship & Automata
description: Robots from all over Tzonac have been detecting strange readings. Five misfit machines join together in a ragtag team to hunt down the dangerous artifact that has surfaced. Little do they know that their very existence may be on the line, and that Tzonac will forever be changed by their actions...

name: Like Veins Beneath the Town
description:
People already have a habit of going missing in the night near that Forest, but this case is a bit... different than the others. 21 women missing. The only evidence washed away in the rain. The village is divided between a select few that desperately want your help and a majority that will make sure you stay out of their affairs, even if you have to be the next one to disappear. Was it kidnapping, murder, or something much more dreadful? Who can you trust? Why was the railway project really abandoned? And what are those strange noises coming from the subway grates? This game will ask many more questions than it will answer-but that never stopped you before, did it now?

Features a dismal story, lots of custom art, one ending and a handful of ways to die with unique scenes!

This game focuses less on puzzles and gameplay, instead having a heavy emphasis on exploration/investigation and storytelling. It's roughly a half hour long depending on your playing speed. There are save points, but it is recommended that you play the entire game in one sitting. This game is set in the same universe as the other two. The order you play them in doesn't matter, but for those of you who are wondering, this is the third game in the series.

name: Moémon Mega FireRed
description: Moémon Mega FireRed is the most advanced Moémon game. It is specially curated to showcase the highest quality Moémon sprites that exist while posing some gameplay challenges. There are many changed aspects include full gameplay changes such as Fairy typing, double encounters, and Mega Evolution.

name: Soulcreek
description: Soulcreek is a sci-fi/romance FVN intended to be released in instalments. It features a human male protagonist with a changeable name and a single m/m love interest. Choices may alter dialogue or relationship dynamics, but are mostly used for roleplaying purposes and have no major consequential effects on the story. There will be a single ending.

name: Glowmonkey2k
description:
This is glowmonkey's origin story.
The year is 1998. A mysterious enemy threatens to end the world by the year 2000.
The enemy is hiding and building an army in multiple servers on the dark web. It mutates and grows stronger as it travels through the internet.
Only the best, and coolest special agent can save the world. Go on an adventure to defeat the enemy and discover its secrets!

name: Mario Rescues Santa Claus
description: Bowser has stolen all of Santa's presents and even kidnapped him! Without Santa, nobody can deliver them!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ancient Dungeon
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ancient Dungeon is a completely new way to play the original The Legend of Zelda on NES. This romhack makes The Legend of Zelda play like a roguelike. Venture through a randomized, ever-changing dungeon with progressive difficulty the further you go. Collect classic items and upgrades, and battle familiar foes throughout your journey. Every playthrough is different. Ganon is lurking deep within the dungeon, but beware, for if you perish, you’ll have to start all over from the beginning. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Kirby Speed Eaters
description:
Kirby Speed Eaters is a Flash game based on the Speed Eaters minigame from Kirby & The Amazing Mirror.

Four Kirbys are at a table. The table has a dish with a metallic lid on it. Occasionally, the dish is uncovered to reveal four apples or bombs. By pressing A, Kirby inhales the apples or bombs. Each apple gives the Kirby who inhaled and ate it one point, while any amount of bombs make the Kirby who inhaled it have to sit out for the next round. Whoever gets eight points first wins. If more than one Kirby presses A quickly, the four apples or bombs will be split between the Kirbys.

name: Baby Shark Run Away
description:
A mysterious and beautiful adventure with William and his friends.
Be the main character of a thrilling story with friends from all over the world.

name: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition
description: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition is simply Rayman Arena PC in its best form possible! Patched by the fans to fully work on Windows 7/10/11 and bundled with essential improvements: HD aI upscaled Textures, controller support, vibration fix, LAN patch, widescreen resolution support, custom player skins...

name: Cosmic Commute
description: Cosmic Commute is a surreal space comedy set in a world stranger than fiction: the public transport system. Playing as everyone's least favourite discount cop - a ticket inspector - discover that even unfathomable creatures have relatable problems.

name: Alien Makeout Simulator
description: Make out with as many glowing lips as you can before time runs out! Some require tenderness while others require rapid pecks. Will your passion be enough to impress?

name: NOX: Chapter 1
description: NOX: Chapter 1 is a first-person puzzle game, where the player has to make use of gravity changes, gravity shifts and portals to explore the dreams and nightmares of a child. All this, in a world inspired by the work of Escher.

name: Lizard Quest
description:
Help out a tiny community of lizards and friends by doing small favors for them

Gather musicians to start a band, clean a dusty home, find a healthy outlet for an angry scorpion, and many more!

name: And Yet It Hurt
description:
And Yet It Hurt is a game about a kid who lived a peaceful and happy life with two lovely parents. All was well, until that fateful day when the tower bell rang.

Since that day, this kid had only one purpose in life: Revenge.

Go on an adventure, solve puzzles, fight enemies, all in Notepad!

name: Last Game of the Decade 2019
description: Hidden object game originally made for Glorious Trainwrecks, and a sequel to "Last GOTY 2018"

name: Babbdi
description: Find your way out of Babbdi. A short, first person exploration experience.

name: Wreckboy
description: A virtual pet game themed after Wrecking Crew for the NES

name: Kryptoria
description: Kryptoria is an immersive 4X and RTS game enabled by the Ethereum blockchain, that encourages players to build an empire in the world of Kryptoria, through economic, technological and military power.

name: D.S.A.
description: D.S.A is a surreal action/adventure game that follows D.S.A, an ameteur girl group, as they get lost on their school campus one night after the worst gig of their lives. And to make matters worse, they're all split up, and tripping out.

name: Flamingo Quest
description: A game about a girl raised by flamingos, called Flamingo.

name: Nocturne
description: Nocturne is a cyberpunk-themed experimental/exploration game. The goal is to simply wander around and enjoy the sights.

name: Idra and the Little Fish
description: Co-op puzzle exploration game

name: Electra
description: Play as an AI that can move around a space by jumping into any other camera that you can see from your current camera.

name: Cautious V
description: Explore weird spaces as a mysterious robed figure.

name: Alien Flowers
description:
Mushrooms are just Alien Flowers.
Surreal world full of artstyle clashing and moods, with a tragic story behind it.

A Yume Nikki fangame created made for Dream Diary Jam 4.

name: Burden 2: Remnants
description:
"In dreaming I can see them again."

This game began as a submission to the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 4 and a sequel to Burden RPG. As a Yume Nikki fangame this game is based off of exploration and discovery directed by the player.

After the events of the horror game Burden, Mila returns to the surface world and tries to live a normal life. But, in her dreams she gets to see her loved ones again.

name: Chiller
description:
A brief, strangely familiar tale of a man who got into trouble at his job and now spends his time all alone, dreaming of better days.

A contribution to DDJ4.

name: Dream Data
description:
Today you start your new job doing data entry for Data Portal Inc. It's not the most exciting job, but it pays the bills. Each night, you go home, go to sleep, and have vivid dreams that let you escape your mundane life. However, sometimes the line between dreams and real life start to get a bit blurred. Will you work hard and keep your job, or will you get out of touch with reality?

The game was heavily inspired by Yume Nikki, and it was created for Dream Diary Jam 4. So like Yume Nikki, the game is mostly just about walking around and exploring dreams. However, there are a few significant changes in how this plays compared to Yume Nikki and most fan games.

name: Fractured Dreams
description:
"You can't ignore them forever."

Fractured Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You explore the dreams of James, and collect effects and tapes in his subconscious.

name: Higurashiki
description:
Play as Higurashiki, an insect-like girl who lives in a strange facility. There's one room she's not allowed to go into until she collects all the effects. When she finally enters, the truth will be revealed.

A Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.

name: Kaizo Nikki
description:
Kaizo Nikki is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A poor fool by the name of "Hitmetsuki" is stuck in a strange place where he is tasked to go through several worlds and obtain "Pillars". It would appear that surviving those worlds might be harder than expected, however.

Kaizo Nikki is a more difficulty-based take on the Yume Nikki formula, featuring more enemies, more puzzles and more tricky terrain to navigate than usual.

name: Lu:Cid
description:
Cid is cooped up in quarantine with little to do but feed the cat, mope around, read, and dream. When they sleep, their worries manifest as strange dream worlds with their own internal consistency. Explore to learn more about their anxieties surrounding the past, future, and present. Collect "dream effects" which change their appearance and grant various powers. Reunite with childhood cats and have them join your dream party.

All in all, I promise you, Cid is going to be OK. But what has happened to Lu?

name: Memorial Playground
description: Memorial Playground is an English fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as August and explore his dreams. These dreams contains elements related to his past.

name: Moonlight
description: Moonlight is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as Rei and explore her dreams.

name: None
description: Play as None as they explore their dreams. This is a game made for Dream Diary Jam 4. The concept and mechanics are based on the 2004 indie game Yume Nikki.

name: Planet Ennea
description: Planet Ennea is a short game made for the fourth Dream Diary Jam using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine. It focuses around a newly built robot and their desire to understand the lives and emotions of those around them. It features way more text than your standard Yume Nikki fangame, but that's fine, isn't it? You won't talk much, but you'll have the chance to listen.

name: Send You a Link
description:
A mysterious link; a weird program that you can't rid of.

Send You a Link is a small, nostalgia themed Yume Nikki fangame made for the Dream Diary Jam 4. The game is heavily inspired in the internet days of 2000-2010ish, including old memes, old teenage obsessions and aesthetics.

name: Super Mado Paf!!
description:
Super Mado Paf!! is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.

It is a shooter game where the player must defeat the enemies moving around the screen. The goal is to get as high a score as possible. You play as Madotsuki and fight against enemies.

name: Talentless.
description: talentless, a Yume Nikki fan game created for the Dream Diary 4 game jam, which follows a protagonist that goes by Lumi.

name: Twin Unconscious
description: Twin Unconscious is an English fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 4.

name: Unduhagge
description: Unduhagge is a dream exploration game in the spirit of Yume Nikki. Join Mina Mori as she navigates a dreamscape full of absurdities, distressing personal memories and other experiences that push her beyond the veil and into the unknown.

name: Ungus
description: Ungus is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Pine, who wakes up in a strange forest, and explore the surrounding world. A submission for the 4th Yume Nikki Fangame jam.

name: Dream Vacation
description:
Dream Vacation is a short Yume Nikki parody fangame.

You play as a young man named Sheru, who refuses to leave his apartment for reasons unknown. You must explore his dreamscape and find 3 effects and 3 []s in order to escape.

name: Dreaming Bad
description: A Breaking Good inspired parody Yume Nikki fangame thats actually about Walt losing his steam account.

name: Yume Smashi
description: Yume Smashi is a story about Smashotsuki, and how with the power of his nearly limitless imagination he will save the world of his own hellish creation in order to reach UBER Tier. A Yume Nikki parody fangame.

name: Nyan Nikki
description: Nyan Nikki is a fangame of both Yume Nikki and Nyan~ Neko Sugar Girls. You play as Raku-chan, one of the characters from the series.

name: Wakana Nikki
description: Wakana Nikki is a Yume Nikki parody fangame. It stars Mimotsuki, Madotsuki’s classmate before Madotsuki died.

name: I-N-K
description: I-N-K is a Yume Nikki/My Little Pony fangame. It stars Inky

name: Emo Neccky
description: Emo Neccky is a short Yume Nikki joke fangame created by an anonymous Uboachan member. It stars Kanashimito.

name: Deep Fried Nikki
description: Deep Fried Nikki is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It was made as a late April Fool's joke, satirizing fangames that are essential re-skins of Yume Nikki. It plays just like Yume Nikki, but with different graphics and music, and with an additional ending located in the White Desert.

name: Scary Nikki
description: Scary Nikki is a parody Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Sanpurutsuki and explore her strange, terrible and have lots of MEMEs dream world.

name: The Spidy Quiz
description: Learn some amazing facts about the Spiders in this quiz game.

name: The Jhonson Parable
description: The Jhonson Parable is a Yume Nikki fangame that centers around a man named Jhonson, who is also known as Worker #069.

name: Soto Nemuri
description: Soto Nemuri is a Yume Nikki/Touhou fangame, made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8. You play as Sumireko from the Touhou series and explore her dreams.

name: Bittersweet Dream
description: A Yume Nikki-inspired fangame. You play as Lizzie and explore their dream world.

name: Botaniki
description: A 3D Yume Nikki fangame. Explore Ouiki's dreams, and uncover the dark world she lives in, and has created for herself.

name: Change
description: A Yume Nikki fangame. Explore your dreams and decide what kind of person you want to become.

name: Growth
description: Growth is a 2.5D Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the protagonist's dream world.

name: Insulted
description: INSULTED is a Yume Nikki fangame. Play as Cathy and collect "Objects" that will help her find even more useful Objects. Avoid the stalker of Cathy's dreams that appears to hunt her down.

name: Lonely
description: Lonely is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Anistasia, a girl who seems to have locked herself in her room. It plays like most fangames, based around exploration and collecting effects. Additionally, there are a few events with dialogue.

name: Wishful Thinking
description: Wishful Thinking is a small Yume Nikki Fangame that stars a 13 year old boy named Joshua, who is a curious and peaceful person that uses their dreams to comfort themselves about a past event.

name: Super Mario Bros: Merry Mountain Christmas Adventure - SMW Christmas Edition V3.0
description: Super Mario World rom hack with a Christmas theme!

name: Yume Inu
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame. Traverse the strange dreams of Hamigaki.

Unlike most fangames, there are two types of dreams the player can have: Lucid and Normal. The Normal dream option takes the player to a random world, while the Lucid dream takes the player to a Nexus-like area. This area starts out empty, with access to other worlds unlocked through having Normal dreams.

The goal of the game is to find all of the effects hidden inside the dream world.

name: Yume Nikki: Atari 2600
description:
Yume Nikki Atari 2600, is an adaptation of Kikiyama's original Yume Nikki replicating style of the Atari console "Atari 2600" a popular console from the 70s - 80s.

The game is to get "Tojos" to get effects without being caught by the toriningens, in a variety of popular maps by original Yume Nikki.

name: Yume Nikki: Mod(ified) Project
description: The Yume Nikki : Mod(ified) Project is a mod that adds new features to the current Yume Nikki build. Much like the original game, it stars Madotsuki. It plays like the original Yume Nikki, with some added areas and NPCs. Unlike the original, Madotsuki can talk to certain NPCs.

name: Yume Metsuki
description: Yume Metsuki is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Karasu, a young girl interested in nature and flight.

name: Plastic Model
description: A very short, free to play game about assembling a plastic model kit. Made by Mike Inel.

name: Yume Nikki GB
description: A demake of Yume Nikki for the Game Boy. The goals are to walk around and collect "Effects" by interacting with objects and other characters.

name: Yume Nikki GB
description: Yume Nikki GB is a Yume Nikki fangame. It is a demake of the original game for the Game Boy. This is a game in which you traverse the extremely dark world inside a dream.

name: Yume Wheeky
description:
Hey, you know the game Yume Nikki? What if it starred a little animal and didn't feature all that blood and stuff?

You are a guinea pig. Your cage is pretty boss: it's got pellets, hay, water, and a buddy. It's also got a comfy place for naps. You like napping.

Take naps, wander the world of dreams, and be a small animal in a confusing world. Encounter strange landscapes, take on new forms and powers, and discover what probably doesn't actually happen when a little animal goes to sleep!

This is a chill exploration game with 100% original graphics, a pretty boss soundtrack, and some very cute li'l piggies.

name: Álom
description: Álom is a Yume Nikki fangame. Explore Alek's dreams, collect memories and effects to discover his backstory, and unlock different endings.

name: Deja Vu
description: deja vu is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Vivienne, a girl refusing to leave her room, instead exploring a dream world.

name: Smile For Me: Collector's Edition
description:
Each copy of the Collector's Edition includes:

- Physical copy of the game
- All 24 Habitician Trading Cards
- 4 Acrylic Standees
- Double-sided Acrylic Charm
- Happiness Fakts Desk Calendar
- Microfiber Cloth
- Lenticular Art Card
- 13-Sticker Sheet
- 2 Inked Stamps
- 9 Window Cling Stickers
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Disorder
description: Disorder is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Sophia, a girl who does not want to leave her room. Like most fangames, the goal is to collect all the effects in the dream world.

name: Mortal Shell: Complete Edition
description:
For the first time, Mortal Shell: Complete Edition brings together all content updates and DLC into one formidable package.

Included in Mortal Shell: Complete Edition is the game-altering Virtuous Cycle expansion - an entirely new roguelike mode that brings random and repeatable savagery to Fallgrim.

Also present is Hadern, once your elusive teacher, now yours to master as Mortal Shell’s fifth possessable and playable character.

Mortal Shell: Complete Edition also features the Rotten Autumn content update, which adds unique Shell shades, a new mini-quest, a powerful new photo mode, and an alternative boss fight soundtrack from black metal band Rotting Christ.

name: Hikensha
description:
Hikensha (or 10 Hikensha) is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The main goal is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

The story takes place years after the events seen in Awaits;10H. You play as Yarishi, a boy who lost some of his memories after a mysterious incident from the past. Yarishi started having recurrent dreams and sightings like he used to have in the past, so this time he decides to go deeper into his dreams and put an end to everything, learning that maybe the world inside his mind might be bigger than he ever imagined.

name: Jigoku Nagashi
description: Jigoku Nagashi is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Shinoko, waiting at a train station.

name: Leviathan
description: Leviathan is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Kurotsuki, a girl who is stranded in her room. The goal is explore and collect Mods.

name: Manonnikki
description: Manonnikki is a Yume Nikki fangame, featuring characters from a web series called loveweb. The game uses parts of late 2000's-early 2010's internet culture in its aesthetics. You play as Manontsuki and explore a strange dream world contained in their computer.

name: Mind Reader
description: Mind Reader is a Yume Nikki fangame. Mind Reader's protagonist is Appuru, a boy unable to leave his room, instead exploring a dream world through sleeping. Appuru's dreams are colorful and sometimes vague, despite the general lack of sound.

name: Shichisei Toushin Guyferd: Crown Kaimetsu Sakusen
description: Shichisei Toushin Guyferd Crown Kaimetsu Sakusen is a game based on Seven Star Fighting God Guyferd, that was a Tokusatsu series made by Toho and Capcom, and aired on TV Tokyo in 1996. Guyferd borrows aspects from Bio Booster Armor Guyver and Fist of the North Star.

name: Mizu
description:
Mizu is a Yume Nikki Fangame that's (quite loosely) based on ancient and almost biblical times. Play as a middle-aged man named Isaac as he finds effects (called Tides here) and explores the world hidden in the statue while trapped in a hut on a deserted island.

Initially made for the 1st 1-week Yume Nikki Fangame Jam.

name: Motherland
description: Motherland is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Maria, a young woman who refuses to leave her room. The main goal of the game is to explore. A minigame called lux can be accessed from the game's Console game folder.

name: Nightmare Diary
description: Nightmare Diary is a Yume Nikki fangame. The main character is KNF, who has bloodstains all over him in the real world. In the dream world he is known as Ketsueki (血液, lit. Blood Liquid), and the bloodstains are removed. Your main goal is to explore the dream world and obtain effects. There is plenty of dialogue in the game as well.

name: REM-9: The Yume Nikki Randomizer
description:
REM-9: The Yume Nikki Randomizer is a randomizer created by vgperson for Kikiyama's Yume Nikki. It is generally recommended for those who have played the original Yume Nikki and know how to get around the dream world.

You can randomize the effects locations or lock nexus door but also you can set the ending to require any number of Effects, as well as any number of Essences (new bonus items given by notable "optional" side events).

name: Sheep
description:
Sheep takes puzzle game elements and blends them into a game that's tailor made for Game Boy Advance.
Your task? Guide these hapless creatures back to the truck. Sounds easy huh? It's not when your sheep keep going in the opposite direction!

name: Rooftop
description: Rooftop is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you explore Lani's dream world. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain effects.

name: The Better Place
description: The Better Place is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where you have to collect an effect, but also orbs that are located in the dream worlds.

name: Balls of Steel Community Project
description: Map design philosophies in the main maps include: kind to blind players, balance for players who don't find secrets, balance between routes, mappers are competent at beating their own maps. Lots and lots of playtesting...

name: You May
description: You May is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game follows a young girl called Yarn as she explores her dreams to rediscover her past and find the items most important to her.

name: Yume-san
description:
Yume-san is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Shiiko, a girl who has forced her way into the dream worlds in order to take a certain someone back with her, collecting effects and parts of a plushie along the way.
Unlike other traditional fangames, this game includes dialogue with certain NPCs.

name: Black Cat: Kikai Shikake no Tenshi
description: Black Cat: Kikai Shikake no Tenshi is a Action RPG video game published by Capcom released on March 30th, 2006 for the PlayStation 2.

name: Mortal Shell: Rotten Autumn
description: Something sinister has arrived in Fallgrim. Possess the Rotten Autumn update and access 10 new shell shades, a brand new photo mode, a new mini quest and an alternative boss OST by Rotting Christ.

name: Alien Dead
description:
Alien Dead is a game about escaping your dreams and awakening to an unknown overworld.
It seems you must reach the deepest part of your dreams first.

But how deep of a sleep do you have to be in?

name: Dawn of Dreams
description: Dawn of Dreams is a 3D fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A woman by the name of Doakeru is our protagonist, a lone being living in the middle of a desert. Nevertheless, she manages to reach other people through her dreams, exploring theirs instead.

name: Batman Begins
description: Game Boy Advance port of Batman Begins.

name: Dream of Life
description:
You play as a boy named Enil.

Enil always fantasized about being able to lucid dream, unfortunately, he has no experience on it, so you will have to make him improve.

Play in a half accurate simulation of lucid dreaming, released for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Immersit
description: A YNFG Fangame made initially for Dream Diary Jam 5. You play as Josephine, who has been locked in her bedroom.

name: Kooky Sphere
description: Kooky Sphere is a game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5 you explore the dreams of Rose.

name: L8R
description: A traditional Yume NIkki fangame, starring a girl named Muratsuki who lives in her room. Made for Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Nightmares and Other True Stories
description: Nightmares and Other True Stories is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, the goal being to explore and interact with the world. A game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Sweet Sleep
description:
With unending amounts of free time, Madotsuki finds herself with a lack of things to do. More often than not, she sleeps. While her dreams were surreal before, they were at least consistent. When her dreams begin to change she finds new turmoil in herself.

Sweet Sleep is a visual novel with branching paths. Features original artwork and music based on the original RPG Maker walking sim.

name: Yuki Nime
description: A Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. Explore a dreamlike and restless world, discoverer all its secrets...

name: Hermeticism
description: Created for Dream Diary Jam 5. This is Yume Nikki inspired game with alchemical themes. You play as Mori, an alchemist who needs to collect ingredients in order to carry out a ritual.

name: Mangaka Dream
description:
Mangaka Dream is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.

Instead of vast looping worlds typically seen in fangames, the dream world mainly comprises of maze rooms, with the goal being to get to reach a room with a treasure chest containing a key item. Once obtained, the player must wake up and repeat the process to obtain all the items and unlock the ending.

You play as an aspiring manga artist who is trying to finish a manga and get it published.

name: The Caverns
description:
An employee at the roadside tourist attraction “The Caverns” falls asleep after closing down the gift shop. Explore their dreams and find the six gifts in order to wake up again.

The game was developed for Dream Diary Jam 5 and is the first entry in a series called The Night Shift Anthology.

name: Traumruf
description:
Traumruf is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.

Traumruf plays like a traditional fangame, focusing on exploration. Unlike most fangames, the player character starts out asleep. Exiting the bedroom will take the player into the dream world. Interacting with the closet changes the main character's appearance.

name: F1 2002
description: Game Boy Advance port of F1 2002.

name: FIFA Soccer 06
description: Game Boy Advance port of FIFA 06.

name: FIFA 2000
description: Game Boy Color port of FIFA 2000.

name: Attic
description:
Attic is a Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

You explore Aurore's dream world. The goal of the game is to explore and find effects.

name: Deteriation Game
description:
Deteriation Game which is a misspelling of deterioration, is a game about exploring your dreams and figuring out who you are. Travel through surreal recreations of your memory, or is it all just real?

Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Dream Records
description: Dream Records is a game where you explore Hizashi's dreams and you can collect hairstyles. A YNFG for DDJ6.

name: Fracture: The Dream
description:
A sudden and seamless realization of consciousness...

Play as Monoe and explore a Labyrinth of interconnected worlds, wherein you discover secrets and come to shocking conclusions.

A 3D Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Internal Plexus
description:
A Cayote named Fletcher wakes up one night when his computer updates on it's own. He finds a mysterious fuse box that wasn't there before attached, and a mass of wires leading to a strange mechanical door in his basement...

It was developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: R5Reloaded
description: Apex Legends R5 Reloaded is a community-run mod that lets you play an older version of Apex Legends offline with custom mods.

name: Severed Ties
description: Severed Ties is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 6. The goal is to explore the dreamworld and find all 9 effects to unlock the ending.

name: Skwampt
description: Skwampt is a Yume Nikki-like game about exploring the memories of an alien flying through space. Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: The Foxglove Catcher
description:
A young man falls down a cavern, into a different world.

The Foxglove Catcher is a Yume Nikki Fangame made for Dream Diary Jam.

name: Federation 2: Community Edition
description: Federation 2, the space trading game, is a massively multi-player game set within an exciting world of interstellar commerce and intrigue, in which you interact and collaborate with lots of other players in real-time, and compete against them to climb the ranks. The aim of the game is to amass a larger fortune (in Imperial Groats) than any other player, and to climb the ranks by forging alliances and making friends with the right people. Cooperation is the name of the game in Federation.

name: Poom: Miasma Massacre
description: Poom is a mod for The Ultimate Doom that parodies the band Black Veil Brides' lead singer, Andy Sixx.

name: They are Confined
description: An entry for the Dream Diary Jam 6. You explore the protagonist's troubled past through their dreams. This game has no "Effects" to collect. Your goal is to find / view particular "Events" that will lead you to the end.

name: World in a Moment
description:
*click* makes the stopwatch as you press its button. The last sound you hear before the world becomes silent and motionless. Wind no longer blows, rain no longer falls. The world has become free of humans, animals and everything else that attests to the flow of time. Without a material body you traverse trough this new realm frozen in time. Days, weeks or perhaps even years go by as you lose yourself on this new adventure before even a moment in you old world passes.

Welcome to World in a Moment, a photo collage exploration game.

name: Haunted House
description: A super short visual novel about exploring a haunted house.

name: Lost Direction
description:
Explore an truly infinite space of pure discovery and full of secrets, find things not meant for your eyes, discover places no one else has, and truly lose direction, all whilst being completely and utterly alone...

Or are you?

name: MAG
description: In this ASCII rogue-like (dungeon crawls with randomized maps) the player explores 20+ levels of a dungeon in order to capture a magical artifact, the Sudbury Sapphire from a group of Imperial Dragons. Features include animated vine traps, labyrinth traps, torches on the walls that can be lit, and pools of vomit.

name: Midnight Shift Remake
description: Step back into the shoes of an unfortunate security guard who encounters strange things while simply leaving for the night. Expect 10 to 15 minutes of game play across both modes, each with a unique ending, and even more play time if you're looking to uncover the secret ending (Extended Scenario).

name: Maggot Face
description: Your sister and a lot of other people are missing, solve the mystery and find your sister Kirsty!

name: Moonlight Moggy
description:
Ah, cats - nature's hot water bottles. But the outside world is teeming with things that can frighten our feline companions and prevent them from getting home for a cosy evening...

Paul, an especially timid ginger tom, has vanished. It falls to his buddy Blixa to track him down. To do so, he'll have to help out the garden's various resident creatures and overcome his own phobia of plastic bags rustling in the wind.

name: Mornings with Java
description:
After recently moving in, Chronos receives much needed help from his neighbour Java. As thanks, he starts spending the mornings with him. Together they learn more about each other and end up falling in love.

MORNINGS WITH JAVA is a visual novel/point and click game created in Ren'Py. Help Chronos make drinks for Java as they spend the mornings with each other.

name: Moth Manor
description: Moth Manor is a short spooky text adventure about an abandoned manor, cryptid encounters, and discovering yourself.

name: Murder 38: Episode One - A Small World
description:
Join our detectives as they solve a grizzly murder on tonight's episode of Murder 38!
Point and click your way through this humorous tale of mystery and coincidence. Use the police computer, look for clues and interview people! All presented in a state of the art cinematic style that blurs the line between games and big budget tv dramas.

name: Core MUD
description:
Welcome to Core Mud, an interactive text MUD set on the planet formal star-charts refer to as Hermes 571-G, but that everyone in the know refers to simply as "Core". Core is one of the most distant settlements known to mankind, most famous for its lucrative yet oppressive mines. But more than mankind can be found here; Core is a diverse group of 9 races in total, all vying for recognition or profits, or both, working for The Company, the megalithic entity running the colony itself. To The Company, everything is secondary to profits. It is up to you to determine how best to survive in this environment, whether that be through combat training, superior mining skills, or technical prowess.

Core MUD is always free to play and features a fun and supportive atmosphere. Roleplaying is encouraged but not mandatory. Mining is your primary source of income, but there are multiple ways to scrape together a few credits... or a few million. Core Mud also features an economy which is player-driven; players own merchandise shops featuring energy weaponry or useful tools, pubs featuring assorted alcoholic (of course) and non-alcoholic beverages, and clinics for healing, to name a few. Come join us today!

name: My Happy Place
description: The player watches old recordings from their (strangely familiar?) dreams, starting from what seems to be a normal day in the streets of your home town...

name: Avalon
description:
A fantasy game world of magnificent proportions unfolds before you: it is the heavy sea-town air of Mercinae, the sound of waves crashing against Parrius, great dark spires piercing the sky of Thakria. This roleplaying world, which existed before the Internet and was the first online RPG game ever, thrives because of its unique world. Great sorcerers, war that can tumble years of real life history in a day, magic that can see beyond time, rituals and vast events that raise mortals to become gods! Avalon's scope is nearly infinite and anything within its walls is possible. As a text-based RPG, it will exceed all expectations: adventurers, merchants, politicians, fighters, forest-loving druids, all cohabitate in this rich, vibrant and brutal world.

Avalon is an online RPG game that has always been ahead of its time. It innovates in the most remarkable ways, inventing new mechanics that you will not see anywhere else for years. Above all else, Avalon is a fair meritocracy. You may quicken your pace but you cannot achieve excellence without deserving it and excellence in any area takes time. It is an environment unlike any other, where players decide the course of history. Find any online roleplaying game today that can match Zaphod of Avalon, who 25 years ago and still sometimes today, will be in Meeting Place sharpening his axe and preparing for battle. Players today do the same as he, building on an epic saga to write their own names into this legendary world.

name: My Uncle's Garden
description: You travel to a small hut in the woods because you received a mysterious letter telling you about a uncle you never heard of. What can possibly go wrong...?

name: Mystery Voyage
description: You find yourself lying on a raft floating in the middle of the sea with no land or anything in sight after you had to abandon ship with the rest of the crew into shark infested waters. Your aim in this three part text adventure is to get yourself back home as you face various challenges and quests, as well as face many monsters and creatures on your travels. Each location is described by text and you type in with the keyboard, commands to control your hero and interact with the locations. Each time a character speaks to you, you can hear it with digitized speech.

name: Framed
description: A daily trivia game in which players must identify a secret movie by a still image from the movie. Players receive six attempts, with each incorrect attempt revealing a new still, or "frame", from the movie.

name: Negative One
description:
Negative One is a first-person retro horror game where you take the role of Lisa.

Lisa discovers a secret abandoned lab beneath her apartment, learning some things are left best not found...

name: Neuro
description:
Several centuries in the future, Earth is at the center of a galaxy-spanning empire. Most colonies are loyal to Earth, though some vie for independence. You play as a soldier working for the central government, who becomes embroiled in political upheaval on the planet Sorgo.

Neuro is a science-fiction first-person-shooter with cyberpunk stylings. It mixes traditional FPS mechanics with gameplay based on psionic powers. The most important ability allows the player to take control of enemies' minds and use them to his/her advantage.

The game is set in the same universe as Revolt Games' earlier space sim, Homeplanet.

name: Not All There
description:
After working overtime one evening, you go to the underground parking lot to search for your car, you notice it's nowhere to be found. The parking lot is completely empty except for one car driving around in circles. A sinister feeling that something bad is going to happen overwhelms you as you continue to search for your car.
Will you make it out alive or should you have stayed at work?

name: Not Involved
description:
Not Involved is a dark fantasy/horror visual novel about Doctor who balances between helping others and taking care of himself.

If you want to save someone, you will have to make sacrifices. How far are you willing to go: being beaten, ostracized, having your limbs chopped off?..

You will find that this world doesn't always reward selflessness and kind heart...

name: Of Ice & Snow
description:
When her younger sister, Veni, leaves for the mainland, Lalao can't help but be hurt.

Leaving for the mainland means abandoning her.
Leaving for the mainland means disrespecting their family's legacy on the Isles.
Leaving for the mainland means she'd never return.

Unable to forgive Veni, Lalao finds herself pulled into an equally unforgiving world of snow, ruled by a Prince with a frozen heart...

Will she let herself be consumed by her pain, even if it means never returning to the island herself?

name: On Leaving the Building
description: In this point and click adventure you play as The King. You have a list of things to do. After that freedom awaits.

name: Turbo Sprint
description: Turbo Sprint is based on the classic arcade game Super Sprint. The game features 8 tracks that range in difficulty, up to four players can take control of either a Blue, Red, Yellow or Green car. Cars that are not controlled by players are computer controlled. When all 8 tracks have been completed the game loops back to the first track but the difficulty is increased with various obstacles and increased speed of the computer controlled cars. New players have the opportunity to join a race after each track has been completed.

name: Space Invaders Micro Player
description: Jump in your spaceship and fend off the waves of attacking enemy invaders before they land. Originally released in 1978, SPACE INVADERS had a revolutionary impact, becoming an instant global phenomenon among arcade enthusiasts and introducing many others to video games.

name: GamePigeon
description: Have fun with your friends and family by playing this collection of excellent multiplayer games via iMessage!

name: Pilgrim
description:
Legend has it that deep in a mountain in the land of Meridan lies a Guardian who is believed to be eternal and would provide help to the people in their darkest need. The Guardian is needed now as Silvian have invaded Meridan once again, destroying everything and killing people with new and strange weapons. You have decided to test the legend of the Guardian by exploring the lands ahead to find the mountain that contains the Guardian. You start your quest waking from unconsciousness in your destroyed room.

Pilgrim is a text adventure where text on screen describes your location and you type in commands with the keyboard to control your hero and interact with each location.

name: Please read me
description: "Please, read me." is a short clickteractive novel where everything is the opposite of what it appears to be.

name: Prepper
description: The storm to end all storms approaches. Prepare for the onslaught of nature without, and the darkness residing within...

name: Pretty Visitors
description:
A group of drug addicts calling themselves "Children of Lucifer" decide to "Cleanse" humankind by "Setting them free".

You play as Jacob and Jessica, a married couple who find themselves helpless in this satanic ritual and try to escape to save their lives.

name: Primrose
description:
Primrose is a rather short psychological survival horror experience, Filled with disturbing and cruel creatures that appear to be thirsty for your blood.

No one will survive except you,
for you, shall be the harbinger of the wrath.
With or without knowledge, You will take part.
You will follow the chosen one on a path,
Filled with yellow roses,
that takes you to the end

name: Mystery House
description:
The first Japanese developed graphical adventure game created by Micro Cabin in 1982. Although it features the same name, it is otherwise unrelated to On-Line Systems' game.

Mystery House, or Mystery House I (ミステリーハウスI) as it is written in Japanese on the box, is an adventure game developed by Micro Cabin in June 1982 for the Sharp MZ-80B followed by various ports for other computers. While Micro Cabin's Mystery House is clearly inspired by the seminal Mystery House created by On-Line Systems in 1980, sharing the same name and similar gameplay, it bares no connection to that title nor its official Japanese port created by StarCraft in 1983. A direct sequel to Micro Cabin's Mystery House was released later in the same year called Mystery House II.

name: Risk of Rain Returns
description:
Carefully designed, beautifully remastered, and loaded with new ways to play—Risk of Rain is back and better than ever! This remake of the classic Risk of Rain packs enhanced visuals, an updated codebase, and tons of new content.

No two runs in the iconic roguelike are the same, and that has never been truer. Risk of Rain Returns bring new and enhanced Survivors, customizable Survivor abilities, fresh items, monsters, and a brand-new game mode. The game’s difficulty increases the longer you play, so prepare to fight through hordes of enemies that threaten your continued existence, collect and combine items to enhance your abilities, and scale your power to godlike levels.

Many Survivors fled the mysterious attack on your ship. Forge new paths to explore with 15 unique Survivors, each with new abilities to master. Two entirely new Survivors are making their debut in Risk of Rain Returns.

name: Zero Gravity
description: Zero Gravity is an early B&W arcade game for Macintosh, in which you try to center your floating character in the center of the gravity chamber. A white dot appears to indicate where the gravity force is currently applied and you move accordingly to stay away from the chamber's sides.

name: Gasnator
description: You are hero super soldier Gasnator. Kill and destroy different enemies and find magic crystal in different areas.

name: Wet Dreams
description: Wet Dreams is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Hello Emoji: Drawing to Solve Puzzles
description: “Hello Emoji: Drawing to Solve Puzzles” is an exciting mini game which will give you a smooth drawing experience. Draw a simple line to make the different balls scroll towards their own destinations. Levels with different difficulty challenge your logically and imagination.

name: Creature Discomfort
description: Adventure game with an inventory and puzzles that are not very hard.

name: Cairo ShootOut!
description: A shooting gallery style game, except instead of aiming with a cursor, players must line their shots up with the scope at the bottom of the screen. Also includes a small puzzle element.

name: EllrLand
description: EllrLand is a new generation of adventure card games. With randomly generated levels, nearly a hundred powerful cards, artifacts for your use, and three unique pets to play with you.

name: Puzz'l
description: Customizable jigsaw puzzle maker.

name: Phrase Craze Plus
description: Wheel Of Fortune style word game for classic Mac.

name: Digital Messiah
description: A combination RPG and arcade game for the Mac.

name: Dumpy: Going Elephants!
description: Strap on that Oculus Rift to become Dumpy the Elephant! She just broke out of a carnival and is bopping her way to freedom. Rotate your head to fling cop cars over mountains and smash delicious ice cream trucks with your mighty trunk.

name: Argol: Kronoss' Castle
description:
Platformer action game, mixing gothic and mythological atmospheres.

Argol: Kronoss' Castle is a platformer action game largely inspired by 90s hits. Between gothic universe and mythological legends, it is decorated as it deserves with a rich and epic soundtrack to make you live an adventure in the purest arcade style.

name: Holy Ghost Story
description: A visual novel about helping the ghost of a schoolgirl move on by completing her unfinished business: some maths homework.

name: Don't Blame You
description: Henry a young adult, for the first time receives his girlfriend at his house, after a night of movies and conversations Kimberly his girlfriend disappears, he looks for her around the house and when he finds her he has bad news.

name: Telusfax
description:
Telusfax is a archaeo-game set in the teletext system of a British television station one day in a half-remembered 2003.

Browse the system to locate the names of the presenters of five different tv shows.

Explore over 50 pages of pseudo-2003 content.
Track down forgotten celebrities.
Get the most up-to-date news regarding the foot and mouth pandemic.
Get the latest football scores.
Read about the music of the day.

name: Solarian II
description: Winner of countless awards and accolades, Solarian II is a Galaga-inspired space shooter, and one of the first colour/color games for the Macintosh.

name: Bill the Demon
description: Side-scrolling platformer starring a demon who eats human souls and screams to destroy walls.

name: Maniac
description: A mix of Pac-Man and Hangman, for the Mac.

name: Gridz
description: Command an army of toolbots, with the goal of building up your territory, destroying opposing forces and hacking your rivals into oblivion. Gridz is a unique strategy title boasting colourful graphics, addictive gameplay and a cast of 15 different toolbots to carry out your bidding.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan
description:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan is a spin-off on the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni franchise with the characters competing with each other in a popular Japanese board game mahjong. The game features traditional Riichi Mahjong rules, which are customizable, however, unlike normal Mahjong, this mahjong game is a one-on-one battle, as opposed to the usual 4 players.

The story is told through NVL segments interspersed with Mahjong minigames.

name: Disorder
description: A Doom II mod with 10 maps.

name: Darkest Wave
description: A mod with 3 maps.

name: Sphinx Lowering
description: A Doom II mod.

name: Capybara
description:
Capybara is a 22-level Boom-compatible (cl9)"speed slaughtermap" community project, consisting bizzare visual designs, unconventional combat designs and some challenging slaughtery gameplay. In this project everybody needs to finish making the maps within 24 hours and only have 4 days to work on them, note that this is not a strict rule.

Majority of the maps are playtested with DSDA-Doom or Gzdoom, however note that you might suffer from unexpected lags in some grandiose slaughter situations. (a.k.a lots, lots of monsters)

name: Pay 4 It
description: A Doom II mod.

name: Elsp
description: A Doom II mod.

name: Ball-e
description:
Ball-e is a singleplayer platformer with roguelike elements.
The player has to beat challenges and bosses to reach the top and become the ultimate Ninja Ball Warrior.

Many characters can be unlocked and various abilities and upgrades can be found during a run.

Additionally the player can compete in smaller challenges and become the fastest on the leaderboard.

name: Poop Killer II
description:
"Poop Killer 2" is a comedy game mixed with trash horror from the 80's and 90's. Inspired by old movies involving marijuana and a lot of shit. It's a short game with the objective to amuse the player, it contains 2 simple endings.

Billy is a marijuana dealer and lives with his friend Jamal in an apartment. They sell and smoke a lot of weed... After your friend takes a shit in your toilet... the poop killer comes to visit you.

name: Poop KIller III
description:
"Poop Killer 3" is the poop killer kill sequel. Increasingly bizarre with an acid comedy typical of 80's and 90's horror/comedy movies.

A game where we mix tension and extremely exaggerated comedy, bullshit in the form of a game. Contains 4 possible endings. Two of them might be good.

Robert owns a nightclub, the year is 1985. After a customer shits and doesn't flush... the Poop Killer will show up to bring you a big piece of shit.

name: MovoD II
description: One-on-one tank combat game on rails for the Mac.

name: Leprechaun
description: Push a pot of gold around single-screen mazes until it's resting on a rainbow.

name: Cigarette Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: That's a lot of pixels!
description: That's a lot of pixels! is a fast-paced retro mini-games compilation, it features a wide variety of genres: rogue-like, platformer, puzzle, shooters, beat'em up, ….

name: Poop Killer 4
description:
"Poop Killer 4" is a game inspired by trashy horror movies from the 80's. With an over-the-top comedy and weird horror.

The game contains 3 possible endings.

name: Poop Killer 5
description:
"Poop Killer 5" is the sequel to the stinkiest and deadliest killer... The Poop Killer Returns...

With a different construction from the previous ones, Leaving the gameplay more dynamic.

name: Poop Killer Origins
description: Did you think "Poop Killer" was over? We're back with the latest game in the franchise, in "Poop Killer Origins" you'll find out how this killer who uses a toilet over his head came to be.

name: Hyper Rosalina Kart Wii & Rosalina 2 Turbo
description: Hyper Rosalina Kart Wii & Rosalina 2 Turbo is a custom character and custom track distribution created by Scuder1aSc0tti. It mainly contains retro tracks and custom tracks from other games. In addition to that, most characters are replaced by a form of Rosalina.

name: Egret II Mini: Arcade Memories Vol. I
description:
A compilation of ten arcade games for Taito's 'Egret II Mini' home arcade machine. This features:
Great Swordsman
Ohgon no Siro
Slap Fight
Daisenpu
PuLiRuLa
Grid Seeker
Riding Fight
Light Bringer
Gekirindan
Cleopatra Fortune

name: The Gods Fabled: Soil Frontier
description: Sow life back into the land in an open-world fantasy farming experience like no other in The Gods Fabled: Soil Frontier!

name: Tamagotchi Angel
description: On the Tamagotchi Planet, floating in the sky is the Tenshitchi Capital, home of the Angels, the spirits of Tamagotchi characters that have died. Angels water the clouds to provide rain across the Planet, grow their angelic powers through prayer, and help and guide the living Tamagotchi in small ways. On the Tamagotchi Angel, many Angels returned to The Earth to spend more time with their human caretakers, and to thank them for letting them live good lives. However, they cannot be away from the Tenshitchi Capital for very long, and must eventually return. The user is tasked with raising their Angel, training them to do good deeds while keeping them from becoming the evil Deviltchi.

name: Transition
description: Transition is an LGBTQIA+ endless color runner that follows a transgender character that transitions from female to male (ftm).

name: Tamagotchi Garden
description: On the Tamagotchi Planet lives a special race of bug-like Tamagotchi characters called Mushitchi. While Mushitchi can be found all over the planet, their biggest and safest home is the Mushitchi Forest. Mushitchi hide amongst the leaves, grass, dirt, and under the ground. Due to this, other Tamagotchi wandering in the forest accidentally step on them occasionally. On the Morino Tamagotchi, the user is tasked with caring for a Mushitchi, helping it grow big while avoiding getting injured.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game
description: Take LEGO Star Wars mobile with the official port for the Game Boy Advance. Experience Star Wars in LEGO form while platforming through The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith.

name: LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
description: Players control Pepper Roni and go around the island trying to locate the Constructopedia pages. Pepper can give the pages he found to certain characters who in turn will build a structure that will help improve the island. Pepper will also have to partake in various mini-games throughout the game. Also, finding hidden Lego character cards is the games reward for observant exploration of the island.
